<h4>[4.1] 2016-03-15</h4>
<ul>
<li>Feature &#8211; Added a tribe_get_venue_website_url() function for fetching Venue website URLs (props to fervorcreative in our forums for this request!)</li>
<li>Performance &#8211; Lazy-load venue and organizer selector data</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Allow iCal filenames to be filtered via a new filter: tribe_events_ical_feed_filename</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Added a hook to allow single day queries in month view to be filtered: tribe_events_month_daily_events_query_args</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Improved the logic around rebuilding known date ranges</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Always show the &#8220;Merge Duplicates&#8221; button for venues and organizers in the Events General Settings page</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Allow the &#8220;same slug&#8221; notice to be dismissed and fix some text in that message</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Ignore alpha/beta/rc suffixes on version numbers when checking template versions</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Add a filter for month view daily events query: tribe_events_month_daily_events_query_args</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Added a more flexible cost range parsing function</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Obfuscate license keys Events &gt; Help &gt; System Information</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed a fatal that sometimes occurred when refreshing the import CSV page</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed issue where some characters were not escaped appropriately for month and year formats</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Added missing tribe-loading@2x.gif</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed a warning produced by passing a DateTime() object into start_date or end_date args of tribe_get_events (props to iamhexcoder for the pull request!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where events in month view were not always sorted in chronological order</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed the System Info URL in Events &gt; Help</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved issue where the default country would be &#8220;Array&#8221; if no default country is set</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where ajaxurl was sometimes undefined</li>
</ul>
<h4>[4.0.7] 2016-03-02</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolve display issues on templates with Jetpack and a few themes</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Mobile breakpoints on month view working with custom breakpoints</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Reordering Venue and Organizer metadata no longer breaks titles</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Prevented notices from happening when using <code>the_title</code> filter</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; iCal links now will respect categories on the first page</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Prevent third-party bugs with SEO plugins when inserting events programmatically</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Organizer information is showing up again correctly</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Modified the add-on license validation method to better explain what is happening</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Description on mobile views now have the correct class attribute on HTML</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Added missing semicolon on the list navigation for &#8220;&amp;laquo&#8221;</li>
</ul>
<h4>[4.0.6] 2016-02-17</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Adjust injection of event data into the_content from priority 10 to 9 for better 3rd-party plugin compatibility</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Change mobile month view selector to load event details below the calendar for better theme compatibility</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Better handling of edge cases on the post_excerpt for List View</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Removal of generic CSS classes like <code>.updated</code> and <code>.published</code></li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Prevent Notices from appearing when using <code>tribe_get_organizer()</code></li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Make HTML Single Event Pages valid</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Numeric named categories URLs are now fully working</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Event Title now Accepts HTML on Tooltips</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Licenses Tab now will work with <code>DISALLOW_FILE_MODS</code> (Props to Sun for spotting and fixing this)</li>
</ul>
<h4>[4.0.5] 2016-01-15</h4>
<ul>
<li>Security &#8211; Security fix with Venues and Organizers (props to grantdayjames for reporting this!)</li>
</ul>
<h4>[4.0.4] 2015-12-23</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Including the latest embedded Event Tickets release for backward compatibility</li>
</ul>
<h4>[4.0.3] 2015-12-22</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Adjust single-event.php template to allow the &#8220;Time&#8221; title and content to be filterable (Props to Sitecrafting for highlighting this issue!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved issue with an overly escaped Event Category edit URL that prevented editing categories (Thanks to Ian for the first report of this issue!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed issue where clicking on columns on the Events listed in the Admin Dashboard were ALWAYS sorted by Event start/end date before sorting by the column selected (Cheers to Corrado for bringing this to our attention!)</li>
</ul>
<h4>[4.0.2] 2015-12-16</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Adding better support for non-numeric cost values on events (Props to Mirja for highlighting this!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Avoid notice level errors when advanced events list widget settings are saved (Thank you Johan for reporting the issue!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Improve messaging in the same-slug warning message (Thanks to Simon for bringing this to our attention!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Hook to Event Tickets to inject event dates into ticket emails</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Adding better support for default venues (Props to Karly for noting this!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Improve handling of internationalized slugs (Cheers to Oliver for the help!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Ensure the past events list displays the correct events when accessed via ajax (Thank you Jesse for highlighting this!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Support ordering by venue/organizer within event queries (Thank you Doug for bringing this to our attention!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed issue where events with the same date/time would sometimes be excluded from single-event navigation (Cheers to JeremyEnglert for the tip!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved issue where events set with the explicit cost of 0 were not showing as &#8220;Free&#8221; (Thank you terrizsolo for reporting this!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where the datepicker in Twenty Sixteen was really ugly</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where using Quick Edit on events caused the table columns in the event list to become jumbled on save (Props to A K for the report!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved bug where category links sometimes included event category 1 (Thank you Anthony for the original report of this problem!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed a settings page URL (Props to Kristy for the heads up!)</li>
</ul>
<h4>[4.0.1] 2015-12-10</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Add a warning message for major updates</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; For SEO reasons, use an h1 for the title rather than an h2 (props to wpexplorer for this fix)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Target the calendar view grid in JS using a simpler selector</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved WP 4.4 related fatal on the Nav Menu page that prevented the admin footer from rendering/enqueuing JS</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved bug where visiting /events/upcoming could sometimes result in an infinite redirect loop</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Removed <code>wp_trim_excerpt</code> and use only it&#8217;s powers, fixing the excerpt problem</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where the mobile calendar view did not display the date for the date being viewed</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where the admin toolbar&#8217;s Events &gt; Import &gt; CSV did not link to the CSV importer page</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed issue where the events list in the admin dashboard were not ordered in an intuitive manner</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved bug where sorting by event category or tag resulted in an error</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where full event content text was displayed where excerpts should have been displayed</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved issue where events imported via CSV were excluded from single event navigation</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where /events/list would sometimes 404 on a new install</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved bug where multiday all-day events displayed the end date as one day later than it should be when the End of Day Cut-off was set to something other than 12am</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Timezone handling fixed within generated iCal feeds</li>
</ul>
<h4>[4.0] 2015-12-02</h4>
<ul>
<li>Security &#8211; A TON of escaping was added to our codebase thanks to the efforts of the always-helpful Andy Fragen (@afragen)</li>
<li>Feature &#8211; Moved the Ticket framework code into its own plugin (event-tickets)</li>
<li>Feature &#8211; The event cost now supports more international formats with the addition of the tribe_events_cost_separators filter (Thank you remokrol for bringing this to our attention!)</li>
<li>Feature &#8211; Added support for the twentysixteen theme</li>
<li>Feature &#8211; Created a new Add-Ons tab in Settings so that TEC add-ons can have a consolidated settings tab</li>
<li>Feature &#8211; Improve the date formats UI by providing example output for each selected format</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Restructured TEC&#8217;s core settings code for reusability with other standalone plugins like Event Tickets</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Deprecate old JS event names in favor of a new JS event naming standard. Example: deprecated tribe_ev_runAjax in favor of run-ajax.tribe</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Consolidated import pages for TEC and add-ons</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; When suggesting a UTF-8 compatibility CSV formatting tool, point to one that still exists</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Added the ability to filter attendees CSV items via tribe_events_tickets_attendees_csv_items (Props to @bostondv on GitHub for this patch!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Updated all excerpt output to use tribe_events_get_the_excerpt() to ensure a consistent display of excerpt content (Cheers to Joseph to pointing this out!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Add support for wp_get_document_title in response to the WordPress 4.4 deprecation of wp_title</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Check post creation permissions before letting users create venues and organizers from the event meta box</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Only display data separators between fields that have data when rendering organizers (Thank you Bud for highlighting this issue!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; When a user cannot create organizers, prevent the auto-selection of organizers when editing an event</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Remove microformat CSS classes from templates and replace with namespaced content-relevant CSS classes</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Changed the &#8220;updated&#8221; CSS class to &#8220;tribe-updated&#8221; so that it is properly namespaced (Thank you vijayrajesh!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; The Plugin Update Checker will now auto-save valid plugin keys (Thanks to Denon for originally bringing this up!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Cleaned up the output of JSON-LD data. Filterable via the new tribe_google_data_markup_json filter</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Drop the use of the generic CSS class &#8220;placeholder&#8221; in favor of &#8220;tribe-event-placeholder&#8221; (Thanks to Marc on the forums!)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Adjusted the CSS padding on Admin Menu items for Events</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Various codesniffer fixes</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; tribe_get_venue_link() no longer echoes if you ask it to return an <a> element</a></li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Error messages for empty Venue names</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Improve our responsiveness for the widget mini calendar, allowing smaller sidebars.</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; No longer retrieve empty costs when fetching all costs for all events</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Change the priority of bootstrapping the-events-calendar to ensure it occurs before any of the TEC addons in the event some addons are upgraded to v4.0 later than TEC</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Adjust the logic used for adding a noindex/follow tag to event views</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; No longer hiding default address fields when default venues are selected when Pro is active</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved issue where the iCal feed did not provide an appropriately formatted timezone in some cases (Cheers to Matt for the report!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Added support for translating some previously untranslatable strings (Props to tititou36, media325, and Stef!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Prevented duplicate CSS IDs on the mini calendars (Cheers to Corrado for the help!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug causing tribe_get_single_ical_link() and tribe_get_ical_link() to use the same URL when it shouldn&#8217;t (Props to Ben Byrne @drywall on Twitter for the heads up!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed issue where the &#8220;Add another organizer&#8221; text wasn&#8217;t using the correct singular label (Thank you MIKE for the report!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Various CSS fixes for twenty(ten-fifteen)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Improved our handling of <code>get_current_screen()</code> across the plugin, avoiding notices and warnings (Thank you Mike for the help!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where accessing object properties on a non object errored out when saving event meta (props to @dalethedeveloper on GitHub for this fix!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed bug where organizer ID meta attached sometimes included a blank record. That blank record is no longer returned in tribe_get_organizer_ids()</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed error message returned when tabbing away from a blank event name meta box so that it properly indicates that an event name is required (Our thanks to @tapan29bd for this fix!)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved issue where Timezone event start/end date property name strings were malformed which guaranteed a a call to get_post_meta for Timezone date strings</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed CSS issue where the month view calendar could sometimes extend beyond the edge of the page when Skeleton Styles were enabled</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed a problem where iCal data was generated with incorrect dates in the case of some all days events (thanks to Matt for highlighting this)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved a problem causing the previous month view to appear when it should not</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixed issue in mobile month view where date was missing from heading</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Resolved issue that caused /events/ to 404 if it was visited on a new install before hitting &#8220;Save&#8221; on the Events &gt; Settings &gt; Display page</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; The Tribe__Events__Main::defaultValueReplaceEnabled() method is being deprecated in favor of tribe_get_option(&#8216;defaultValueReplace&#8217;). Schedules for removal in v4.5</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; The tribe_event_link() has been deprecated in favor of tribe_get_event_link(). Scheduled for removal in 5.0</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; The third parameter of tribe_get_organizer_link() (the $echo parameter) has been deprecated and is scheduled for removal in 5.0</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Abstract_Deactivation in favor of Tribe__Abstract_Deactivation</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Admin__Helpers in favor of Tribe__Admin__Helpers</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__App_Shop in favor of Tribe__App_Shop</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Autoloader in favor of Tribe__Autoloader</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Cache in favor of Tribe__Cache</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Cache_Listener in favor of Tribe__Cache_Listener</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Changelog_Reader in favor of Tribe__Changelog_Reader</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Credits in favor of Tribe__Credits</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Date_Utils in favor of Tribe__Date_Utils</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Field in favor of Tribe__Field</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Settings in favor of Tribe__Settings</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Settings_Tab in favor of Tribe__Settings_Tab</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Support in favor of Tribe__Support</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Template_Part_Cache in favor of Tribe__Template_Part_Cache</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Tickets__Attendees_Table in favor of Tribe__Tickets__Attendees_Table in the event-tickets plugin</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Tickets__Metabox in favor of Tribe__Tickets__Metabox in the event-tickets plugin</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Tickets__Ticket_Object in favor of Tribe__Tickets__Ticket_Object in the event-tickets plugin</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Tickets__Tickets in favor of Tribe__Tickets__Tickets in the event-tickets plugin</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Tickets__Tickets_Pro in favor of Tribe__Tickets__Tickets_Handler in the event-tickets plugin</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Validate in favor of Tribe__Validate</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__View_Helpers in favor of Tribe__View_Helpers</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::OPTIONNAME in favor of Tribe__Main::OPTIONNAME</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::OPTIONNAMENETWORK in favor of Tribe__Main::OPTIONNAMENETWORK</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::addHelpAdminMenuItem() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::add_help_admin_menu_item()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::addNetworkOptionsPage() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::add_network_options_page()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::array_insert_after_key() in favor of Tribe__Main::array_insert_after_key()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::array_insert_before_key() in favor of Tribe__Main::array_insert_before_key()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::debug() in favor of Tribe__Debug::debug()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::defaultValueReplaceEnabled() in favor of tribe_get_option( &#8216;defaultValueReplace&#8217; )</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::doHelpTab() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::do_help_tab()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::doNetworkSettingTab() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::do_network_settings_tab()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::doSettingTabs() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::do_setting_tabs()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::do_licenses_tab() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::do_licenses_tab()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::getNetworkOption() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::get_network_option()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::getNetworkOptions() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::get_network_options()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::getNotices() in favor of Tribe__Notices::get()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::getOption() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::get_option()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::getOptions() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::get_options()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::have_addons() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::have_addons()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::isNotice() in favor of Tribe__Notices::is_notice()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::pluginDir in favor of Tribe__Events__Main::plugin_dir</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::pluginName in favor of Tribe__Events__Main::plugin_name</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::pluginPath in favor of Tribe__Events__Main::plugin_path</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::pluginUrl in favor of Tribe__Events__Main::plugin_url</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::removeNotice() in favor of Tribe__Notices::remove_notice()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::renderDebug() in favor of Tribe__Debug::render()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::saveAllTabsHidden() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::save_all_tabs_hidden()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::setNetworkOptions() in favor of Tribe__Settings_Manager::set_network_options()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::setNotice() in favor of Tribe__Notices::set_notice()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; Tribe__Events__Main::truncate() in favor of tribe_events_get_the_excerpt()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; tribe_event_beginning_of_day() in favor of tribe_beginning_of_day()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; tribe_event_end_of_day() in favor of tribe_end_of_day()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; tribe_event_format_date() in favor of tribe_format_date()</li>
<li>Deprecated &#8211; tribe_events_the_notices() in favor of tribe_the_notices()</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.x and previous</h4>
<p>For release notes from the 3.x and older lifecycles, see our <a href="https://theeventscalendar.com/category/products/release-notes/" rel="nofollow ugc">full historical release notes</a>.</p>

/downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/the-events-calendar.5.9.0.zip";s:5:"5.9.1";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/the-events-calendar.5.9.1.zip";s:5:"5.9.2";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/the-events-calendar.5.9.2.zip";s:5:"trunk";s:62:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/the-events-calendar.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:18:"https://evnt.is/29";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"1x";s:72:"https://ps.w.org/the-events-calendar/assets/icon-128x128.gif?rev=2516440";s:2:"2x";s:72:"https://ps.w.org/the-events-calendar/assets/icon-256x256.gif?rev=2516440";}s:12:"contributors";a:0:{}s:6:"market";N;s:11:"custom_link";N;}s:15:"ultimate-member";a:28:{s:4:"name";s:82:"Ultimate Member â€“ User Profile, User Registration, Login &amp; Membership Plugin";s:4:"slug";s:15:"ultimate-member";s:7:"version";s:5:"2.3.0";s:6:"author";s:56:"<a href="http://ultimatemember.com/">Ultimate Member</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:46:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/ultimatemember/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"5.0";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"rating";i:88;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:1065;i:4;i:64;i:3;i:30;i:2;i:37;i:1;i:132;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:1328;s:15:"support_threads";i:349;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:285;s:10:"downloaded";i:5989554;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2021-12-20 8:49am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2015-01-21";s:8:"homepage";s:26:"http://ultimatemember.com/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:9623:"<h4>Best User Profile &amp; Membership Plugin for WordPress</h4>
<p>Ultimate Member is the #1 user profile &amp; membership plugin for WordPress. The plugin makes it a breeze for users to sign-up and become members of your website. The plugin allows you to add beautiful user profiles to your site and is perfect for creating advanced online communities and membership sites. Lightweight and highly extendible, Ultimate Member will enable you to create almost any type of site where users can join and become members with absolute ease.</p>
<h4>Features of the plugin include:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Front-end user profiles</li>
<li>Front-end user registration</li>
<li>Front-end user login</li>
<li>Custom form fields</li>
<li>Conditional logic for form fields</li>
<li>Drag and drop form builder</li>
<li>User account page</li>
<li>Custom user roles</li>
<li>Member directories</li>
<li>User emails</li>
<li>Content restriction</li>
<li>Conditional nav menus</li>
<li>Show author posts &amp; comments on user profiles</li>
<li>Developer friendly with dozens of actions and filters</li>
</ul>
<p>Read about all of the plugin&#8217;s features at <a href="https://ultimatemember.com" rel="nofollow ugc">Ultimate Member</a></p>
<h4>Paid Extensions</h4>
<p>Ultimate Member has a range of extensions that allow you to extend the power of the plugin. You can purchase all of these extensions at a significant discount with our <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/pricing/" rel="nofollow ugc">All Access Pass</a> or you can purchase extensions individually.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-notes/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Notes</a> &#8211; Allow users to create public and private notes from their profile</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/profile-tabs/" rel="nofollow ugc">Profile Tabs</a> &#8211; Allow to add the custom tabs to profiles</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-locations/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Locations</a> &#8211; Allow to display users on a map on the member directory page and allow users to add their location via their profile</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/unsplash/" rel="nofollow ugc">Unsplash</a> &#8211; Allow users to select a profile cover photo from <a href="https://unsplash.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">Unsplash</a> from their profile</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-bookmarks/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Bookmarks</a> &#8211; Allow users to bookmark content from your website</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-photos/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Photos</a> &#8211; Allow users to upload photos to their profile</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/groups/" rel="nofollow ugc">Groups</a> &#8211; Allow users to create and join groups around shared topics, interests etc.</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/private-content/" rel="nofollow ugc">Private Content</a> &#8211; Display private content to logged in users that only they can access</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-tags/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Tags</a> &#8211; Lets you add a user tag system to your website</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/social-activity/" rel="nofollow ugc">Social Activity</a> &#8211; Let users create public wall posts &amp; see the activity of other users</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/woocommerce/" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce</a> &#8211; Allow you to integrate WooCommerce with Ultimate Member</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/private-messages/" rel="nofollow ugc">Private Messages</a> &#8211; Add a private messaging system to your site &amp; allow users to message each other</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/followers/" rel="nofollow ugc">Followers</a> &#8211; Allow users to follow each other on your site and protect their profile information</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/real-time-notifications/" rel="nofollow ugc">Real-time Notifications</a> &#8211; Add a notifications system to your site so users can receive real-time notifications</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/social-login/" rel="nofollow ugc">Social Login</a> &#8211; Let users register &amp; login to your site via Facebook, Twitter, G+, LinkedIn, Instagram and Vkontakte (VK.com)</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/bbpress/" rel="nofollow ugc">bbPress</a> &#8211; With the bbPress extension you can beautifully integrate Ultimate Member with bbPress</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/mailchimp/" rel="nofollow ugc">MailChimp</a> &#8211; Allow users to subscribe to your MailChimp lists when they signup on your site and sync user meta to MailChimp</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-reviews/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Reviews</a> &#8211; Allow users to rate &amp; review each other using a 5 star rate/review system</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/verified-users/" rel="nofollow ugc">Verified Users</a> &#8211; Add a user verification system to your site so user accounts can be verified</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/mycred/" rel="nofollow ugc">myCRED</a> &#8211; With the myCRED extension you can integrate Ultimate Member with the popular myCRED points management plugin</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/notices/" rel="nofollow ugc">Notices</a> &#8211; Alert users to important information using conditional notices</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/profile-completeness/" rel="nofollow ugc">Profile Completeness</a> &#8211; Encourage or force users to complete their profiles with the profile completeness extension</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/friends/" rel="nofollow ugc">Friends</a> &#8211; Allows users to become friends by sending &amp; accepting/rejecting friend requests</li>
</ul>
<h4>Free Extensions</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/jobboardwp/" rel="nofollow ugc">JobsBoardWP</a> &#8211; This free extension integrates Ultimate Member with the job board plugin <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/jobboardwp">JobBoardWP</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/forumwp/" rel="nofollow ugc">ForumWP</a> &#8211; This free extension integrates Ultimate Member with the forum plugin <a href="https://forumwpplugin.com" rel="nofollow ugc">ForumWP</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/terms-conditions/" rel="nofollow ugc">Terms &amp; Conditions</a> &#8211; Add a terms and condition checkbox to your registration forms &amp; require users to agree to your T&amp;Cs before registering on your site.</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/google-recaptcha/" rel="nofollow ugc">Google reCAPTCHA</a> &#8211; Stop bots on your registration &amp; login forms with Google reCAPTCHA</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/online-users/" rel="nofollow ugc">Online Users</a> &#8211; Display what users are online with this extension</li>
</ul>
<h4>Theme</h4>
<p>Our official <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/theme/" rel="nofollow ugc">theme</a> is purpose built for websites that have logged in and out users. The <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/theme/" rel="nofollow ugc">theme</a> has deep integration with Ultimate Member plugin and the extensions, different header designs for logged-in/out users and works alongside the Beaver Builder and Elementor page builders.</p>
<h4>Our other plugins</h4>
<p>In addition to Ultimate Member, we also have two other plugins: <a href="https://forumwpplugin.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">ForumWP</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/jobboardwp">JobBoardWP</a>.</p>
<h4>ForumWP</h4>
<p><a href="https://forumwpplugin.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">ForumWP</a> is a forum plugin which adds an online forum to your website, allowing users to create topics and write replies. Forums are a great way to build and grow an online community.</p>
<h4>JobBoardWP</h4>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/jobboardwp">JobBoardWP</a> is a job board plugin which adds a modern job board to your website. Display job listings and allow employers to submit and manage jobs all from the front-end.</p>
<h4>Development * Translations</h4>
<p>If you&#8217;re a developer and would like to contribute to the source code of the plugin you can do so via our <a href="https://github.com/ultimatemember/ultimatemember" rel="nofollow ugc">GitHub Repository</a>.</p>
<p>Want to add a new language to Ultimate Member? Great! You can contribute via <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/ultimate-member" rel="nofollow ugc">translate.wordpress.org</a>.</p>
<p>If you are a developer and you need to know the list of UM Hooks, make this via our <a href="https://docs.ultimatemember.com/article/1324-hooks-list" rel="nofollow ugc">Hooks Documentation</a>.</p>
<p>If you are a developer and you need to know the structure of our code, make this via our <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/php-docs/" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation API</a>.</p>
<h4>Documentation &amp; Support</h4>
<p>Got a problem or need help with Ultimate Member? Head over to our <a href="http://docs.ultimatemember.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">documentation</a> and perform a search of the knowledge base. If you canâ€™t find a solution to your issue then you can create a topic on the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/ultimate-member">support forum</a>.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:268:"<ol>
<li>Activate the plugin</li>
<li>That&#8217;s it. Go to Ultimate Member &gt; Settings to customize plugin options</li>
<li>For more details, please visit the official <a href="http://docs.ultimatemember.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation</a> page.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:1614:"
<dt id='do%20i%20need%20to%20know%20any%20coding%20to%20use%20this%20plugin%3F'>
Do I need to know any coding to use this plugin?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No, we have built Ultimate Member to be extremely easy to use and does not require you to manually build shortcodes or have any coding knowledge.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20ultimate%20member%20mobile%20responsive%3F'>
Is Ultimate Member mobile responsive?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Ultimate Member is designed to adapt nicely to any screen resolution. It includes specific designs for phones, tablets and desktops.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20ultimate%20member%20multi-site%20compatible%3F'>
Is Ultimate Member multi-site compatible?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Ultimate Member works great on both single site and multi-site WordPress installs.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20the%20plugin%20work%20with%20any%20wordpress%20theme%3F'>
Does the plugin work with any WordPress theme?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Ultimate Member will work with any properly coded theme. However, some themes may cause conflicts with the plugin. If you find a styling issue with your theme please create a post in the community forum.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20the%20plugin%20work%20with%20caching%20plugins%3F'>
Does the plugin work with caching plugins?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The plugin works with popular caching plugins by automatically excluding Ultimate Member pages from being cached. This ensures other visitors to a page will not see the private information of another user. However, if you add features of Ultimate Member to other pages you have to exclude those pages from being cached through your cache plugin settings panel.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:131046:"<h4>Important:</h4>
<ul>
<li>To learn more about version 2.1 please see this <a href="https://docs.ultimatemember.com/article/1512-upgrade-2-1-0" rel="nofollow ugc">docs</a></li>
<li>UM2.1+ is a significant update to the Member Directories&#8217; code base from 2.0.x. Please make sure you take a full-site backup with restore point before updating the plugin</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.3.0: December 20, 2021</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added: WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Viber messengers predefined fields.</li>
<li>Added: Callback for deleting the custom field data from member direcroty settings when this custom field has been deleted in Form Builder.</li>
<li>Added: &#8216;um_account_active_tab_inited&#8217; JS hook.</li>
<li>Updated: Require a strong password option (<code>Ultimate Member &gt; Settings &gt; General &gt; Users &gt; Require a strong password?</code>) to make it common for all Ultimate Member forms. Renamed option key from <code>reset_require_strongpass</code> to <code>require_strongpass</code>.</li>
<li>Updated: Form errors texts on the login/password reset forms. Made them secure.</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>Ultimate Member &gt; Settings &gt; General &gt; Account &gt; Require a strong password?</code> option and merged with <code>Ultimate Member &gt; Settings &gt; General &gt; Users &gt; Require a strong password?</code> option.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: &#8220;Clear All&#8221; button for the filters with &#8220;&amp;&#8221; symbol in the label.</li>
<li>Fixed: Uninstall process when delete UM data. Avoid the issue when 3rd-party pages that had been selected as UM page are removed on UM uninstall.</li>
<li>Fixed: Header meta for the Twitter Card. If the user has twitter field filled then  will be filled by this value.</li>
<li>Fixed: Member directory a slider filter&#8217;s label displaying. It uses the filled label for now.</li>
<li>Fixed: SkypeID field validation. Also all SkypeID fields on your forms changed type from <code>url</code> to <code>text</code>. SkypeID supports nicknames or https://join.skype.com/{hash} links.</li>
<li>Fixed: Typos in Account &gt; Privacy tab texts related to Download/Erase the user data.</li>
<li>Fixed: Some typos in the fields&#8217; labels.</li>
<li>Fixed: &#8220;false&#8221; display name in the member directory. It displays empty for now if the user hasn&#8217;t display name.</li>
<li>Fixed: <code>UM()-&gt;clean_array()</code> function.</li>
<li>Fixed: LinkedIn field URL. Added ability to display the organization URL.</li>
<li>Fixed: Canonical link of the user profile if WPML plugin is active.</li>
<li>Fixed: Replacing placeholders in nav menus. Used an earlier hook for filtering items before generating HTML and avoided issues with raw, not-escaped HTML inside tags&#8217; attributes.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Templates required update:</p>
<ul>
<li>members-grid.php</li>
<li>members-list.php</li>
<li>password-reset.php</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Cached and optimized/minified assets(JS/CSS) must be flushed/re-generated after upgrade</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.2.5: September 22, 2021</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added: Ability to insert SoundCloud track URL instead of Track ID</li>
<li>Added: Settings for the password min/max length (Ultimate Member &gt; Settings &gt; Users)</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Invalid role keys on the role list-table + role edit screen (case when latin symbols used with not UTF-8 symbols)</li>
<li>Fixed: Restriction logic and archive lists (+ nav menu bar) with active &#8220;Disable pre-queries for restriction content logic&#8221; option</li>
<li>Fixed: Restriction settings fields conditions on wp-admin screens</li>
<li>Fixed: Account <code>user_login</code> field validation removed as redundant. The field is disabled and not used in code flow</li>
<li>Fixed: <code>display_name</code> data update after First + Last name fields edition on the Account page</li>
<li>Fixed: Password length validation on the Account page and Password Reset page</li>
<li>Fixed: Using custom fields from multi-select dropdowns for user&#8217;s <code>Display Name</code>. Unserialized custom field&#8217;s values</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed: Handling the login form errors via \WP_Error</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.2.3: August 25, 2021</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added: &#8216;um_ignore_restricted_title&#8217; hook for workaround show post title of the restricted post</li>
<li>Added: Disable pre-queries for restriction content logic (&#8216;disable_restriction_pre_queries&#8217;) option for backward compatibility with business logic where 404 error for restricted content isn&#8217;t a good way</li>
<li>Added: Replace the restricted Post Title (&#8216;restricted_post_title_replace&#8217;) option for ability to disable restricted post&#8217;s title replace</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: <code>pre_get_terms</code> callback to avoid the conflicts with other terms queries</li>
<li>Fixed: Terms query and global access settings on PHP8 installations</li>
<li>Fixed: Member directory dropdown filters where options contain <code>&amp;</code> symbol</li>
<li>Fixed: Displaying 404 error for the restricted Media</li>
<li>Fixed: Displaying &#8216;Login as this user&#8217; action on the user profile</li>
<li>Fixed: Sanitizing of the social links fields (e.g. Twitter, Facebook, etc.)</li>
<li>Fixed: Visibility of a restricted taxonomy page in the nav menu</li>
<li>Fixed: Sanitizing key for the drag&amp;drop action</li>
<li>Fixed: Sanitizing the description field with allowed HTML inside</li>
<li>Fixed: The &#8220;Assignment to constant variable&#8221; JS error on some sites</li>
<li>Fixed: Keep description formatting in a view mode</li>
<li>Fixed: Profile form nonce handling, security enhancement</li>
<li>Fixed: `um_edit_profile_url()&#8220; function and added $user_id attribute</li>
<li>Optimized: Restriction content handlers, avoid queries duplicates or unnecessary queries</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.1.17: April 14, 2021</h4>

<li>Added: Hooks for integration member directory filters with different conditions for query to DB</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Editing private profiles capability. Removed the priority for &#8220;Can edit other member accounts?&#8221; capability when the account is private. (#805)</li>
<li>Fixed: PHP notice when the admin filtering field has the not array default value (e.g. bool)</li>
<li>Fixed: The conflict with <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/disable-blog/">Disable Blog</a> plugin regarding this <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/ultimate-member-file-image-download/">issue</a>. <code>download_routing</code> callback has the highest priority now.</li>
<li>Fixed: Fields privacy functionality. This function <code>um_can_view_field()</code> has been rewritten (#780)</li>
<li>Fixed: Fields privacy + form validation functionality. Skip the field&#8217;s validation that aren&#8217;t visible on the form based on the privacy settings (#795)</li>
<li>Fixed: PHP notice in the confirm password label <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/undefined-index-label-php-notice/">wp.org thread</a></li>
<li>Fixed: Confirm password placeholder when label is empty</li>
<li>Fixed: Permanently deleting form&#8217;s field (#786)</li>
<li>Fixed: Default value with comma for checkbox field-type (#729)</li>
<li>Fixed: Gutenberg blocks conditional settings (#793)</li>
<li>Fixed: Getting active Profile tab when some of them are hidden</li>
<li>Fixed: Restricted content message is showing twice and removing header, avoid the conflicts with themes that use &#8216;the_content&#8217; filter in header or footer (#799)</li>
<li>Fixed: &#8220;Is required&#8221; validation for the multiselect field-type when it&#8217;s empty on submit</li>
<li>Fixed: Using &#8216;wp_login_failed&#8217; hook, added 2nd parameter required since WordPress 5.4 version (#810)</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed: Security vulnerability with User Account page and password field</li>
<li>Fixed: User creating without username but based on first+last name with not-ASCII symbols</li>
<li>Fixed: Password reset hash generating more than 1 time</li>
<li>Fixed: Random order type translation string on the member directory</li>
<li>Fixed: Resize and compress images when uploading on User Profile images fields or user wall</li>
<li>Fixed: Displaying more than 1 UM popups on the same page</li>
<li>Fixed: UM dropdown.js position calculation</li>

<li>There are changed PHPâ€™s intval(), strval(), floatval(), and boolval() typecasting functions to (int), (string), (float) and (bool) regarding <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2020/11/20/miscellaneous-developer-focused-changes-in-wordpress-5-6/" rel="nofollow ugc">this doc</a>.</li>

<ul>
<li>Fixed custom meta table fields migration (create, edit, remove field actions)</li>
<li>Fixed wp-login.php and UM login form validation/errors triggers when using email for login</li>
<li>Fixed profile form duplicates, show only the first form shortcode on the page for the user with selected role</li>
<li>Fixed creating user uploads directory on registration</li>
<li>Fixed Role fields validation on registration</li>
<li>Fixed Erase User Data field on the Account page</li>
<li>Fixed profile privacy</li>
<li>Fixed SkypeID field</li>
<li>Fixed clickable links in the UM forms which are displayed in a modal window</li>
<li>Fixed disabling select and textarea fields in inactive tabs on Account</li>
<li>Fixed compatibility with jQuery 3.x and &#8216;load&#8217; event</li>
<li>Fixed some translations</li>
<li>Small PHP notices fixes</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.5: April 2, 2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added number field-type to member directory filters</li>
<li>Changed export/erase personal data in account page</li>
<li>Sanitizing variables in wp-admin</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed PHP notice &#8216;form_id&#8217; on account submission</li>
<li>Fixed birthday range for member directory filter</li>
<li>Fixed fields visibility when user can edit other users</li>
<li>Fixed honeypot JS</li>
<li>Fixed edit mode for Role (Dropdown/Radio) fields (getting editable priority role)</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.4: February 24, 2020</h4>

<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>

<li>Added formatting for submitted data</li>
<li>Added fields notices functionality</li>
<li>Added sanitizing $_GET variables in wp-admin side</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed activation licenses with sslverify</li>
<li>Fixed fields&#8217; options if they contains spaces in the start and the end of option (added trim)</li>
<li>Fixed getting range for slider filters</li>
<li>Fixed 2.1.3-beta3 package upgrade</li>
<li>Fixed resize image on registration form</li>
<li>Fixed multiselect field styles</li>
<li>Fixed issue with not editable fields and their visibility</li>
<li>Fixed displaying header with member counts</li>
<li>Fixed JS errors with not defined tinyMCE on Forms builder</li>
<li>Fixed issues with &#8220;key =&gt; value&#8221; fields (dropdown + multiselect) if &#8216;um_select_options_pair&#8217; filter is used</li>
<li>Fixed social URLs validations</li>
<li>Fixed Ultimate Member wrapper&#8217;s visibility on add/edit user page (wp-admin)</li>
<li>Fixed jQuery-UI library images</li>
<li>Fixed vulnerability with sanitizing $_POST</li>
<li>Fixed last login order on member directories when UM metatable is turned on</li>
<li>Fixed RTL styles at Account page and Member Directory</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.3: January 21, 2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added sorting by Last &amp; First name</li>
<li>Added integrations with future extensions</li>
<li>Added filter for changing the order of options in select-type filter</li>
<li>Added GDPR template to get overwritten in the theme directory</li>
<li>Added member directories&#8217; custom sorting labels</li>
<li>Added ability to use custom metatable for faster requests for Member Directories</li>
<li>Added ability to request Erase or Download user data via Privacy tab at the Account page</li>
<li>Added an option to set the &#8220;Hide profile from directory&#8221; option by default</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed [um_loggedin] shortcode render with htmlspecialchars_decode</li>
<li>Fixed checkbox options missing selections with conditional settings</li>
<li>Fixed vulnerability with uploading cover/profile photo for other user ID</li>
<li>Fixed integration with WPML for Account and User pages in case if there are different permalinks for different languages for these pages</li>
<li>Fixed issues with pagination settings</li>
<li>Fixed search line additional slashes</li>
<li>Fixed issues with member results JS template</li>
<li>Fixed getting posts count at the Posts tab for 3rd party integrations</li>
<li>Fixed member directories&#8217; admin filtering</li>
<li>Fixed issue with reset filters on member directory</li>
<li>Fixed getting image/file custom fields values in form submission with not validated values</li>
<li>Fixed JS handlers for select-type filters with callback and parent/child relations</li>
<li>Fixed um_convert_tags for array-type values</li>
<li>Fixed small CSS issues</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed Role filter</li>
<li>Fixed clearing filters with || condition</li>
<li>Fixed endless recursion in the function um_check_conditions_on_submit()</li>
<li>Fixed issue that appears if we try to update several plugins at once</li>
<li>Fixed using different templates for different member directories</li>
<li>Fixed form previews, added overlay and displayed buttons</li>
<li>Fixed wp-admin/admin-post.php access issue</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.1.0: November 11, 2019</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added member directory list view</li>
<li>Added member directory search bar</li>
<li>Added member directory filters by range, date and time</li>
<li>Added AJAXed member directories</li>
<li>Updated member directories&#8217; search engine</li>
<li>Additional parameter &#8216;user_id&#8217; to action hook &#8216;um_user_after_updating_profile&#8217;</li>
<li>Added ability to set profile/cover image sizes from Ultimate Member -&gt; General -&gt; Uploads settings or Original size</li>
<li>Added ability edit cover photo HTML (e.g. for adding some HTML attributes. See how add srcset attribute based on all generated cover sizes <a href="https://docs.ultimatemember.com/article/1519-change-cover-photo-html" rel="nofollow ugc">here</a>)</li>
<li>Added custom date format for Date Picker field</li>
<li>Added hook &#8216;um_show_meta_item_html&#8217; to customize user meta HTML at User Profile page</li>
<li>Added &#8220;aria-label&#8221; attribute in Field icon</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Optimized usermeta for Account submit security</li>
<li>Fixed flushing rewrite rules on every page reloading</li>
<li>Fixed Gmail &amp; Yahoo UTF-8 encoding of email notification subject</li>
<li>Fixed ajax_resize_image() process</li>
<li>Fixed country fields values</li>
<li>Fixed dynamic_profile.php notice</li>
<li>Fixed integration with WP native admin_post and admin_post_nopriv requests</li>
<li>Fixed profile image settings</li>
<li>Fixed profile privacy for not logged in users, if restriction options set for profile page as visible only for logged in and showing message instead of redirect<br />
(it makes the same for {site_url}/user and {site_url}/user/{user_slug} )</li>
<li>Fixed security issue on registration form submission when username or email have conditional logic</li>
<li>Fixed RTL styles issues on user profile and account pages</li>
<li>Fixed upload profile/cover photos at the profile page, don&#8217;t apply until the crop finished</li>
<li>Fixed alphabetical field validation for cyrillic and not UTF-8 symbols</li>
<li>Fixed user profile validation if username, username or email, password and email fields were added to form</li>
<li>Fixed user profile preview in admin Form Builder</li>
<li>Fixed getting templates function for some Windows servers</li>
<li>Fixed plugin update process for multisites</li>
<li>Fixed function &#8220;um_apply_conditions&#8221;. An error appears with jQuery v2.1.3</li>
<li>Localized um-raty.js library</li>
<li>Localized strings</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<li>New files/images downloading process</li>
<li>Added dependencies with User Photos and Groups extensions</li>
</ul>
</li>

<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>File/Image email placeholders after registration form submitting</li>
<li>File/Image forms fields values on submit/edit</li>
<li>Fixed multisite file/image upload process</li>
<li>Fixed clearing old user sessions after the changing a password</li>
<li>Made reset password process via WP native functions</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.4: April 10, 2018</h4>

<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added activation dependencies for extensions</li>

<li>Added visual integration WPML+UM email notifications</li>
<li>Added Account Upgrade email notification</li>
<li>Added ability to register users using role field on Registration Form</li>
<li>Added Account page shortcodes for each tab content</li>
<li>Changed UM Option View (deprecated/added options)</li>
<li>Changed UM Roles, optimized for WP native logic</li>
<li>Changed backend forms/fields to WP native styles</li>
<li>Changed Content Restriction feature for posts, taxonomies, menus</li>
<li>Changed Email Notifications settings and using templates logic</li>
<li>Deprecated Redux Framework</li>
<li>Deprecated old unusable options</li>
<li>Deprecated old unusable forms metadata</li>
<li>Deprecated old unusable member directories metadata</li>
<li>Deprecated old unusable user roles metadata</li>
<li>Optimized registration/upgrade profile process (some hook deprecated)</li>
<li>Optimized some code parts, deprecated some functions</li>
<li>Updated <code>FontAwesome</code> library</li>
<li>Removed addons to separate extensions</li>
<li>Created Plugin Updater for getting updates and license details from Shop</li>
<li>Increased integration abilities, added new hooks (see new Hooks Docs + PHP documentation);</li>
<li>Integrated plugin activation, user creation processes with multisite</li>
<li>Make dependencies with extensions</li>
<li>OOP structure without procedural methods for wp-admin side;</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed avatars on some SSL installs</li>
<li>Fixed some vulnerabilities</li>
<li>Fixed integrations with core/extensions</li>
<li>Fixed <code>Edit Profile</code> button at members directory</li>
<li>Fixed conditional logic PHP validation and JS validation (for IE,Edge browsers)</li>
<li>Fixed textdomains for translations</li>
<li>Fixed integration with Woocommerce, SEO Framework, WPML</li>
<li>Fixed navigation menu items custom fields (<code>Mega Menu</code>, etc. compatibility)</li>
<li>Fixed theme conflicts with UM js libraries</li>
<li>Fixed and optimized handlers for user permalinks</li>
<li>Fixed replace placeholders for users</li>
<li>Fixed conditional fields logic</li>
<li>Fixed fields sanitize for remove XSS injections</li>
</ul>
</li>

<h4>1.3.73: November 17, 2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Adds a filter hook to modify the submitted details on registration process
<ul>
<li><code>um_before_save_filter_submitted</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds a filter hook to disable canonical link in header
<ul>
<li><code>um_allow_canonical__filter</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds a filter hook to modify the auto-generated email address on registration process
<ul>
<li><code>um_user_register_submitted__email</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds filter hooks to modify locale, language file path and textdomain
<ul>
<li><code>um_language_textdomain</code></li>
<li><code>um_language_locale</code></li>
<li><code>um_language_file</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds filter hook to modify the data of selected value:
<ul>
<li><code>um_is_selected_filter_data</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds new select/multi-select options to retrieve options from a callback.
<ul>
<li>In the form builder, edit or add a select/multi-select field and add your callback function in <code>Choices callback</code> field to get populated.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds parent select field option to dynamically populate another select field.
<ul>
<li>If <code>Choices Callback</code> option is set in the field settings,  the <code>Parent Option</code> triggers an Ajax request to populate the child options on <code>change</code> event.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Updates <code>um.min.js</code> file.</li>
<li>Updates <code>en_US</code> translation file.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Removes notices from WPCLI console.</li>
<li>Removes notices from edit profile mode</li>
<li>Removes autocomplete from search filter fields</li>
<li>Fix translation strings of search filters on a member directory</li>
<li>Fix email notifications not sending on registration process</li>
<li>Fix field selection with special characters on form submission</li>
<li>Fix assigning of role on register submission process</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.72: October 10, 2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Improves the bulk filters, actions and redirection in <code>User Screens</code></li>
<li>Adds new access options to disallow access on homepage and category pages. </li>
<li>Adds Textarea to show in profile tagline on Member Directory</li>
<li>Adds a filter hook <code>um_allow_frontend_image_uploads</code> to allow profile and cover photo uploads on front-end pages.</li>
<li>Adds new filter hooks to modify image field data on upload:
<ul>
<li><code>um_image_handle_global__option</code></li>
<li><code>um_image_handle_{$field}__option</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds a new filter hook to modify the redirection of non logged in users who visit the parent user page.
<ul>
<li><code>um_locate_user_profile_not_loggedin__redirect</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Improves generate dummies tool with <code>wp_remote_get</code></li>
<li>Adds a new action hook for a new section in cover area:
<ul>
<li><code>um_cover_area_content</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Updates the English translation .po and .mo files.</li>
<li>Improves the shortcode <code>um_show_content</code> to swap the <code>user_id</code> with the current profile.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixes a bug where multi-select field options doesn&#8217;t match the user selected options that contain html entities.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to display correct role slugs in radio and select fields.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where reset password form is conflicting with register and login form on a page.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where Users queue count in the Admin &gt; <code>All Users / Users</code> menu doesn&#8217;t update when a user account is in <code>pending user review</code> and gets deleted.</li>
<li>Fixes a typo in Password Reset Email option&#8217;s description</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where conditional fields &#8216;equals to&#8217; validation on registration process</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to disable the query with hiding account on member directory</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to retrieve specific number of members </li>
<li>Fixes a bug to retrieve all members with <code>get_members</code> new parameter <code>number</code></li>
<li>Fixes a typo in Welcome Email template.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where login form redirection is set to <code>wp-admin/admin-ajax.php</code> instead of the current page when loaded via ajax.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where uninstall link doesn&#8217;t load.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to redirect users to correct URL after login based from login options.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where non-logged in users are not able to access the profile page when <code>Global Site Access</code> is set to <code>Site accessible to Logged In Users</code>.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to modify the login redirection url especially when DOING_AJAX is defined.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to retrieve correct community roles per site in a Multisite Network setup.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.3.69: September 08, 2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Adds a system information tool for support purposes</li>
<li>Adds a new option to disable generating profile slugs on every load of member directory pages.
<ul>
<li>Located in UM &gt; Settings &gt; Advanced &gt; Stop generating profile slugs in member directory.</li>
<li>This improves the performance when loading profiles in directories. It generates profile slug on Profile Update ( front and back-end ), Registration Process and viewing the Users in the back-end.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds new filter hook <code>um_activate_url</code> to modify the account activation url.</li>
<li>Adds new filter hooks to modify first and last name cases
<ul>
<li><code>um_user_first_name_case</code> </li>
<li><code>um_user_last_name_case</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds new filter hooks to modify nonces of image and file uploads
<ul>
<li><code>um_file_upload_nonce</code> </li>
<li><code>um_image_upload_nonce</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Improves search member filters and keyword sensitivity</li>
<li>Improves generation of profile slugs</li>
<li>Improves force capitalization of display names with dash</li>
<li>Improves the pagination and loading of profiles in member directory</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixes a bug where users in member directory are missing after updating their profile</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to generate random email when email field is not added in a form.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to show hidden members in member directory for admins</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to validate username length on registration process</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to display profile name in dynamic menu and profile page title</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where frequent security notices show on registration process</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to assign correct role to a user on registration process</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to display correct roles in radio and dropdown fields</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to validate the reset password</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to change the assign of role in navigation menu items</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to select radio field in profile form</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to allow frontpage and posts page to handle custom access settings</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where profile role field&#8217;s conditional logic doesn&#8217;t show/hide the second field.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to show &#8216;Last Login&#8217; field in profile edit and view mode.</li>

<h4>1.3.30: December 3, 2015</h4>

<li>New: added Simplified Chinese language support</li>
<li>Tweak: added many new filters (for developers)</li>
<li>Fixed: Display name update in profile</li>
<li>Fixed: Photo upload unique IDs</li>
<li>Fixed: Remove duplicated method um_convert_tags</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.29: October 31, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added new documentation links to plugin files</li>
<li>New: added filters to control profile photo menu (for developers)</li>
<li>Fixed: added security patch to remove decrypted passwords from database</li>
<li>Fixed: bug with blocked words during registration</li>
<li>Fixed: some localization strings</li>
<li>Fixed: php warnings/bugs on specific installs</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.28: October 13, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Bug with plugin folder structure</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.27: October 13, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Role name display in Users dashboard</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.26: September 25, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added Greek language support</li>
<li>Tweak: added custom class to every user meta in member directory</li>
<li>Tweak: added option to stop flushing rewrite rules every load (performance tweak)</li>
<li>Fixed: WPML issue on multisite install</li>
<li>Fixed: Removed redux menu from tools</li>
<li>Fixed: fix for wp_authenticate_username_password()</li>
<li>Fixed: searching users by e-mail address</li>
<li>Fixed: conflict with sites with thousands of pages</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.25: September 7, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: 404 error on UM pages</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.24: September 6, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: saved some database queries</li>
<li>Tweak: plugin not compatible with cache plugins out of the box &#8211; needs to exclude dynamic urls from cache</li>
<li>Tweak: added more development filters in backend</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.23: September 2, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: PHP strstr() notice on profile</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.22: September 2, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: compatibility bug with older PHP versions</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.21: September 2, 2015</h4>

<li>Fixed: image upload path in email notification</li>
<li>Fixed: php issue with displaying name</li>
<li>Fixed: missing localisation strings</li>
<li>Fixed: couple of php notices</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.20: August 28, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added security measure for profile photo uploads</li>
<li>New: added filter to hook in registration details sent in email notification</li>
<li>New: added core pages filter to allow you change pages of extensions within plugin settings (e.g. activity)</li>
<li>Fixed: multi-select field filtering bug</li>
<li>Fixed: strip slashes from field names in fields modal</li>
<li>Fixed: show drag and drop footer content only in the drag and drop form builder page</li>
<li>Fixed: profile photo crop/upload issue</li>
<li>Fixed: category/post specific restriction conflict</li>
<li>Fixed: display UM classes only in UM pages</li>
<li>Fixed: minor code improvements</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed: conflict with Podcast feed</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed: issue with image upload when form has errors</li>
<li>Fixed: resolved issue with disabling profile menu / tabs</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.61: February 20, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Upload button text is made translatable</li>
<li>Fixed: conflicts with Divi theme</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with Roles dropdown field</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.60: February 18, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: added a protection to prevent wp-admin lockout for admin users</li>
<li>Tweak: new hook for account page form submitting (for developers)</li>
<li>Tweak: added a few missing translations</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with roles dropdown not saving its state</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with roles dropdown when made required in form</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with tabbing on form fields</li>
</ul>

<li>New: added facebook meta tags on user profiles (You have to disable facebook og tags in your SEO plugin)</li>

<li>Fixed: timestamp on registration info shows form submission date/day</li>

<li>New: added option to add text to dividers (which can be added using the drag-and-drop form builder)</li>
<li>New: security improvement: added whitelisted IP(s) option to allow you to access the WP-admin screen always (prevents lockout)</li>
<li>New: added filter hook um_whitelisted_wpadmin_access to control access to wp-admin login screens (for developers)</li>
<li>New: added custom css option to apply extra css styling rules from plugin settings</li>
<li>New: added custom css option to each form allowing you to apply extra styling rules per form</li>
<li>New: added option to customize profile fields area width (per form basis) besides global option</li>
<li>Tweak: compatibility with default permalinks (Pretty permalinks are strongly recommended though!)</li>
<li>Tweak: improved the function that gets user IP address</li>
<li>Tweak: performance: inline css from the plugin is automatically compressed/minified</li>
</ul>

2";s:64:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/ultimate-member.2.2.2.zip";s:5:"2.2.3";s:64:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/ultimate-member.2.2.3.zip";s:5:"2.2.4";s:64:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/ultimate-member.2.2.4.zip";s:5:"2.2.5";s:64:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/ultimate-member.2.2.5.zip";s:5:"2.3.0";s:64:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/ultimate-member.2.3.0.zip";s:5:"trunk";s:58:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/ultimate-member.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:0:"";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"1x";s:68:"https://ps.w.org/ultimate-member/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=2143339";s:2:"2x";s:68:"https://ps.w.org/ultimate-member/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=2143339";}s:12:"contributors";a:0:{}s:6:"market";N;s:11:"custom_link";N;}s:15:"bsk-pdf-manager";a:28:{s:4:"name";s:15:"BSK PDF Manager";s:4:"slug";s:15:"bsk-pdf-manager";s:7:"version";s:5:"3.1.3";s:6:"author";s:53:"<a href="http://www.bannersky.com/">BannerSky.com</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:41:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/bannersky/";s:8:"requires";s:5:"3.2.1";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";b:0;s:6:"rating";i:94;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:37;i:4;i:0;i:3;i:1;i:2;i:0;i:1;i:3;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:41;s:15:"support_threads";i:2;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:0;s:10:"downloaded";i:211518;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2021-11-10 1:52pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2013-03-08";s:8:"homepage";s:45:"http://www.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager-pro/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:1367:"<p>Although the plugin called &#8220;PDF Manager&#8221; but it also can manage other files such as: pdf, zip, gz, rar, png, jpg, jpeg, gif, tif, tiff, swf, docx, xlsx, pptx, csv, crtfsv, pages, numbers, keynote, ies.</p>
<p>The plugin help you manage your PDFs / Files in WordPress. You may upload by categories and display by categories or show one special PDF / File.</p>
<p>Each PDF / document can have its own permalink, it means you may share the permalink to your customers and update the PDF / document content at anytime.</p>
<p>It is easy to use. You just need add the shortcodes into the page / post where you want to show. Then it will show the PDFs / Files link in your page / post.</p>
<p>With widget feature you may show PDFs list in a widget area.</p>
<p>From version 2.8 you may visit PDF / document directly by its id such as: <a href="https://demo.bannersky.com/?bskpdfm-id=100" rel="nofollow ugc">https://demo.bannersky.com/?bskpdfm-id=100</a></p>
<p>Please visit <a href="http://www.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager/" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager/</a> for documentations.</p>
<p>Check demos from: <a href="https://demo.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager-demos/" rel="nofollow ugc">https://demo.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager-demos/</a></p>
<p>Pro version available now! You may upgrade to pro version for more features.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:1676:"<p>Activate the plugin then you can use either a shortcode [bsk-pdfm-pdfs-ul id=&#8221;ALL&#8221; order_by=&#8221;date&#8221; order=&#8221;DESC&#8221; target=&#8221;_blank&#8221;] to show all PDFs / Documents in date descending order. Or use [bsk-pdfm-pdfs-ul id=&#8221;8,9,10,11,12&#8243; target=&#8221;_blank&#8221;] to show special PDFs / Documents.</p>
<p>Check <a href="https://www.bannersky.com/document/bsk-pdf-manager-documentatio-v2/display-specific-pdfs-in-list/" rel="nofollow ugc">here for more shortcode attributes</a> and <a href="https://demo.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager-demos/display-all-specific-pdfs/all-pdfs-in-unordered-list-in-date-descending-order-open-in-new-window-with-pagination/" rel="nofollow ugc">here for demos</a> about this shortcode.</p>
<p>You may use [bsk-pdfm-category-ul id=&#8221;1&#8243; show_cat_title=&#8221;yes&#8221; order_by=&#8221;date&#8221; order=&#8221;DESC&#8221;] to show all PDFs / Documents under the category of id 1 or [bsk-pdfm-category-ul id=&#8221;1,2,3&#8243; show_cat_title=&#8221;yes&#8221; order_by=&#8221;date&#8221; order=&#8221;DESC&#8221;] to show all PDFs under categories of id 1, 2, 3 in date descending order.</p>
<p>Check <a href="https://www.bannersky.com/document/bsk-pdf-manager-documentatio-v2/display-pdfs-by-category-in-list/" rel="nofollow ugc">here for more shortcode attributes</a> and <a href="https://demo.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager-demos/display-pdfs-by-category/display-pdfs-by-category-in-unordered-list-with-pagination/" rel="nofollow ugc">here for demos</a> about this shortcode.</p>
<p>The plugin has a very easy admin page that allows you to manage categories and PDF documents.</p>
";s:3:"faq";s:171:"<p>Please visit <a href="http://www.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager/" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.bannersky.com/bsk-pdf-manager/</a> for documentations or supporting.</p>
";s:9:"changelog";s:15108:"<p>3.1.3</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: update codes to secure output content</li>
</ul>
<p>3.1.2</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: the codes of order_by in sql that may cause trouble</li>
</ul>
<p>3.1.1</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: the bug when set widget in backend and display widget in front</li>
</ul>
<p>3.1</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Added: support documents( PDFs ) Permalink feature</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Added: support documents( PDFs ) to be put in trash</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Added: new category filter option to show  documents( PDFs ) that have no category assigned.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Added: document status link to list all, published, scheduled, expired, trash</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Added: screen options to be applied to documents list page</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Added: more parameters to the hook bsk_pdfm_after_document_insert and bsk_pdfm_after_document_update</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Updated: don&#8217;t delete documents( PDFs ) in a category when delete the category.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Updated: backend PDFs list page, add more status and view</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed: the All label cannot be translated in tags filter</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed: the bug of invalid file path when move document out from Media Library</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Compatible with WordPress 5.8.1</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>3.0.1</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of target=&#8221;_blank&#8221; not work</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed typo</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Compatible with WordPress 5.8</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>3.0</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Add new feature of generating featured image from the selected page of the PDF</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Support deleting featured image when delete PDF / document</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Remove old shortcodes</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Add new action of bsk_pdfm_after_document_insert</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Add new action of bsk_pdfm_after_document_update</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Add new action of bsk_pdfm_after_bulk_add_by_ftp</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Add new action of bsk_pdfm_after_bulk_add_by_media_lib</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Compatible with WordPress 5.7.2</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>2.9.3</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Change to use WordPress&#8217; new date function.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of html description cannot be saved and shown for document( PDF ).</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of html description cannot be saved and shown for category.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of html description cannot be saved and shown for tag.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of causing NextGEN Gallery cannot edit thumb.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Compatible with WordPress 5.7</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>2.9.2</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Support WordPress that installed to its own directory</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Support WordPress that changed default content directory</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Support WordPress that changed default uploads directory</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the issue of &#8220;missing file&#8221; on WordPress that installed in sub directory</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of showing date wrong format in PDF title</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>2.9.1</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>IMPORTANT: from version 3.0 we&#8217;ll remove the shortcakes [bsk-pdf-manager-pdf id=&#8221;1&#8243;] and [bsk-pdf-manager-list-category id=&#8221;1&#8243;]. Please change to use [bsk-pdfm-pdfs-ul id=&#8221;1&#8243;] and [bsk-pdfm-category-ul id=&#8221;1&#8243;]. For more attributes of the two shortocdes, please check documents form https://www.bannersky.com/document/bsk-pdf-manager/</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Sanitize user entered data before process</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Support ordering by ID for categories and tags</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Support linking category to all document that assoicated to it</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of cannot delete documents when delete category</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Improve admin interface</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Compatible with WordPress 5.6.1</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>2.9</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Supports date&amp;time for tag and order by date when display tags in front</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Add options to display widget title in h3 or h4 tag instead of always h2</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the warning message when add category widget in backend and display in front</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of time for category cannot be updated</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of tag title, description cannot be updated</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Fixed the bug of tags displayed in categories list screen</p>
</li>
