Analytics, Search Console, AdSense, Speed";s:4:"slug";s:15:"google-site-kit";s:7:"version";s:6:"1.48.1";s:6:"author";s:50:"<a href="https://opensource.google.com">Google</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:38:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/google/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.7";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"rating";i:82;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:315;i:4;i:19;i:3;i:18;i:2;i:22;i:1;i:65;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:439;s:15:"support_threads";i:158;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:136;s:10:"downloaded";i:27964412;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2021-12-21 8:12pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2019-10-31";s:8:"homepage";s:30:"https://sitekit.withgoogle.com";s:8:"sections";a:4:{s:11:"description";s:1998:"<p>Site Kit is the official WordPress plugin from Google for insights about how people find and use your site. Site Kit is the one-stop solution to deploy, manage, and get insights from critical Google tools to make the site successful on the web. It provides authoritative, up-to-date insights from multiple Google products directly on the WordPress dashboard for easy access, all for free.</p>
<h4>Bringing the best of Google tools to WordPress</h4>
<p>Site Kit includes powerful features that make using these Google products seamless and flexible:</p>
<ul>
<li>Easy-to-understand stats directly on your WordPress dashboard</li>
<li>Official stats from multiple Google tools, all in one dashboard</li>
<li>Quick setup for multiple Google tools without having to edit the source code of your site</li>
<li>Metrics for your entire site and for individual posts</li>
<li>Easy-to-manage, granular permissions across WordPress and different Google products</li>
</ul>
<h4>Supported Google tools</h4>
<p>Site Kit shows key metrics and insights from different Google products:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Search Console:</strong> Understand how Google Search discovers and displays your pages in Google Search. Track how many people saw your site in Search results, and what query they used to search for your site.</li>
<li><strong>Analytics:</strong> Explore how users navigate your site and track goals you&#8217;ve set up for your users to complete.</li>
<li><strong>AdSense:</strong> Keep track of how much your site is earning you.</li>
<li><strong>PageSpeed Insights:</strong> See how your pages perform compared to other real-world sites. Improve performance with actionable tips from PageSpeed Insights.</li>
<li><strong>Tag Manager:</strong> Use Site Kit to easily set up Tag Manager- no code editing required. Then, manage your tags in Tag Manager.</li>
<li><strong>Optimize:</strong> Use Site Kit to easily set up Optimize- no code editing required. Then, set up A/B tests in Optimize.</li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:1803:"<p><strong>Note</strong>: Make sure that your website is live. If your website isn&#8217;t live yet, Site Kit can&#8217;t show you any data.<br />
However, if you have a staging environment in addition to your production site, Site Kit can display data from your production site in the staging environment. Learn how to use <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/using-site-kit-on-a-staging-environment/" rel="nofollow ugc">Site Kit with a staging environment</a>.</p>
<h4>Installation from within WordPress</h4>
<ol>
<li>Visit <strong>Plugins &gt; Add New</strong>.</li>
<li>Search for <strong>Site Kit by Google</strong>.</li>
<li>Install and activate the Site Kit by Google plugin.</li>
<li>Connect Site Kit to your Google account. If there are multiple WordPress admins, keep in mind that each admin must connect their own Google account in order to access the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<h4>Manual installation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Upload the entire <code>google-site-kit</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory.</li>
<li>Visit <strong>Plugins</strong>.</li>
<li>Activate the Site Kit by Google plugin.</li>
<li>Connect Site Kit to your Google account. If there are multiple WordPress admins, keep in mind that each admin must connect their own Google account in order to access the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<h4>After activation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Visit the new <strong>Site Kit</strong> menu.</li>
<li>Follow the instructions in the setup flow.</li>
<li>Go to the main Site Kit dashboard which already displays key metrics from Search Console.</li>
<li>Connect additional Google tools under <strong>Site Kit &gt; Settings</strong>. Learn more about <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/choose-tools/" rel="nofollow ugc">which tools are right for you</a>.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:4384:"<p>For more information, visit the <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/" rel="nofollow ugc">official Site Kit website</a>.</p>

<dt id='is%20site%20kit%20free%3F'>
Is Site Kit free?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The Site Kit plugin is free and open source, and will remain so. Individual Google products included in Site Kit are subject to standard terms and fees (if any) for those products.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20are%20the%20minimum%20requirements%20for%20site%20kit%3F'>
What are the minimum requirements for Site Kit?
</h4>
<p>
<p>In order to successfully install and use Site Kit, your site must meet the following requirements:</p>
<ul>
<li>WordPress version 4.7+</li>
<li>PHP version 5.6+</li>
<li>Modern browser â€“ Internet Explorer is not supported</li>
<li>Is publicly accessible â€“ it isnâ€™t in maintenance mode, accessible only via password, or otherwise blocked</li>
<li>REST API is available â€“ Site Kit must be able to communicate via REST API with Google services. To ensure that the REST API is available for your site, go to Tools &gt; Site Health.</li>
</ul>
</p>
<dt id='why%20is%20my%20dashboard%20showing%20%E2%80%9Cgathering%20data%E2%80%9D%20and%20none%20of%20my%20service%20data%3F'>
Why is my dashboard showing â€œgathering dataâ€ and none of my service data?
</h4>
<p>
<p>It can take a few days after connecting Site Kit to a Google service for data to begin to display in your dashboard. The â€œgathering dataâ€ message typically appears when youâ€™ve recently set up a Google service (i.e. just created a new Analytics account) and/or your site is new, and data is not yet available for display.</p>
<p>If you are still seeing this message after a few days, feel free to get in touch with us on the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/google-site-kit/">support forum</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='why%20aren%E2%80%99t%20any%20ads%20appearing%20on%20my%20site%20after%20i%20connected%20adsense%3F'>
Why arenâ€™t any ads appearing on my site after I connected AdSense?
</h4>
<p>
<p>If youâ€™re new to AdSense when you connect via Site Kit, your new AdSense account and your site will need to be manually reviewed and approved for ads by the AdSense team. Ads will not display until your account and site have been approved. <a href="https://support.google.com/adsense/answer/76228" rel="nofollow ugc">Check out this guide for more information about the approval process and timeline.</a></p>
<p>You can check your approval status in Site Kit by going to Settings &gt; Connected Services &gt; AdSense and clicking â€œCheck your site status.â€ This link will direct you to AdSense. If you see â€œReady,â€ your account and site have been approved and should be displaying ads. If you see â€œGetting readyâ€¦,â€ your account and site are still under review and your site will not display ads until they have been approved.</p>
<p>If the AdSense snippet is successfully embedded on your site <strong>and</strong> your account and site have been approved, but your site is still not showing ads, <a href="https://support.google.com/adsense/#topic=3373519" rel="nofollow ugc">contact the AdSense Help Center for assistance</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20site%20kit%20gdpr%20compliant%3F'>
Is Site Kit GDPR compliant?
</h4>
<p>
<p>When using Site Kit, site owners are responsible for managing notice and consent requirements â€“ including GDPR requirements â€“ as described in <a href="https://policies.google.com/terms" rel="nofollow ugc">Googleâ€™s Terms of Service</a>.</p>
<p>By default, Site Kit does anonymize IP addresses upon activation of the Google Analytics module. In addition, Site Kit provides a mechanism in the form of a simple API for cookie consent plugins to integrate with Site Kit and prevent Site Kit&#8217;s Google service snippets from being rendered on a page if the user has not granted consent. More information about how this API works is available in <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2087" rel="nofollow ugc">this GitHub issue</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20get%20additional%20support%3F'>
Where can I get additional support?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Please create a new topic on our <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/google-site-kit/">WordPress.org support forum</a>. Be sure to follow the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/guidelines/">support forum guidelines</a> when posting.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:195055:"<h4>1.48.1</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Revert fix to prevent minification of already minified JS files by other plugins as it caused JS translations to no longer be delivered by wordpress.org. Props kebbet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4592" rel="nofollow ugc">#4592</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.48.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add title to the overall page metrics widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4454" rel="nofollow ugc">#4454</a>.</li>

<li>Update the plugin activation banner to be a simple CTA link instead of replicating the splash screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4403" rel="nofollow ugc">#4403</a>.</li>
<li>Update the behaviour of the PageSpeed&#8217;s <code>visit the dashboard</code> link to scroll to the PSI widget when the user lands on the dashboard page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4380" rel="nofollow ugc">#4380</a>.</li>
<li>Include query parameter for custom Analytics step in the service setup flow URLs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4342" rel="nofollow ugc">#4342</a>.</li>

<li>Fix the incorrect difference for chart values when the current and the previous values equal zero. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4255" rel="nofollow ugc">#4255</a>.</li>

<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix various JS errors due to problems with the Google Charts library. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4074" rel="nofollow ugc">#4074</a>.</li>
<li>Remove leftover use of <code>helpVisibility</code> feature flag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4069" rel="nofollow ugc">#4069</a>.</li>
<li>Fix validation for Subscribe with Google publication ID so that it allows non-domain input. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4025" rel="nofollow ugc">#4025</a>.</li>
<li>Fix font problems in the Idea Hub widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4012" rel="nofollow ugc">#4012</a>.</li>
<li>Fix positioning of the Site Kit header at the breakpoint between mobile and tablet viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3986" rel="nofollow ugc">#3986</a>.</li>
<li>Update the post state for Idea Hub posts and enable it for posts of all statuses. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3909" rel="nofollow ugc">#3909</a>.</li>
<li>Use query params instead of hash URLs in Idea Hub tabs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3886" rel="nofollow ugc">#3886</a>.</li>
<li>Improve Idea Hub tab behaviour when using browser navigation. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3860" rel="nofollow ugc">#3860</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent Idea Hub tab navigation from adding to the browser&#8217;s history. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3796" rel="nofollow ugc">#3796</a>.</li>
<li>Update the Detailed Page Stats page to display AMP traffic for an AMP version of a page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3080" rel="nofollow ugc">#3080</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Analytics queries for URL lists to ignore titles for the metrics, while still showing the title for each URL. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3070" rel="nofollow ugc">#3070</a>.</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.36.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Enhance experience for sites with UA Analytics already configured before GA4 is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3586" rel="nofollow ugc">#3586</a>.</li>
<li>Implement Idea Hub datastore infrastructure for saving and dismissing an idea. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3556" rel="nofollow ugc">#3556</a>.</li>
<li>Display measurement ID for Google Analytics 4 property in Settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3545" rel="nofollow ugc">#3545</a>.</li>
<li>Update text in some Google Analytics 4 notices. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3544" rel="nofollow ugc">#3544</a>.</li>
<li>Show separate UA and GA4 snippet toggles in Analytics Settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3542" rel="nofollow ugc">#3542</a>.</li>
<li>Improve Google Analytics 4 notices. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3540" rel="nofollow ugc">#3540</a>.</li>
<li>Improve user survey styling on mobile viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3530" rel="nofollow ugc">#3530</a>.</li>
<li>Show Terms of Service and Privacy Policy in User Feedback survey if the user hasn&#8217;t opted-in to tracking. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3528" rel="nofollow ugc">#3528</a>.</li>
<li>Implement a minimal settings panel for the Idea Hub module. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3521" rel="nofollow ugc">#3521</a>.</li>
<li>Update API client library and AdSense integration to use the new version 2 of their API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3517" rel="nofollow ugc">#3517</a>.</li>
<li>Improve button tooltips across plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3516" rel="nofollow ugc">#3516</a>.</li>
<li>Update button links to show &#8220;opens in new tab&#8221; ARIA help text, and open all User Feedback links in a new tab. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3510" rel="nofollow ugc">#3510</a>.</li>
<li>Don&#8217;t show notifications if a user survey has already been displayed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3508" rel="nofollow ugc">#3508</a>.</li>
<li>Display date range for data in the Admin Bar. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3202" rel="nofollow ugc">#3202</a>.</li>
<li>Remove the option to include/exclude logged-in users when the Analytics snippet is not placed via Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2910" rel="nofollow ugc">#2910</a>.</li>
<li>Update error message shown to AMP users when connecting Tag Manager after Analytics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2292" rel="nofollow ugc">#2292</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix potential React error when using Google Translate and then changing the date range in a Site Kit admin screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3636" rel="nofollow ugc">#3636</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a bug where GA4 settings were not cleared when deactivating Analytics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3616" rel="nofollow ugc">#3616</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AMP validation error caused by the GA opt-out snippet conditionally placed by Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3572" rel="nofollow ugc">#3572</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure account and property are preselected during setup when user has a matching GA4 property only. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3543" rel="nofollow ugc">#3543</a>.</li>
<li>Update Analytics account creation to ensure a GA4 property is always created when GA4 is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3539" rel="nofollow ugc">#3539</a>.</li>
<li>Fix an infinite loading state when attempting to create a new Analytics account with GA4. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3537" rel="nofollow ugc">#3537</a>.</li>
<li>Only show a GA4 creation notice once an account is selected in Analytics setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3536" rel="nofollow ugc">#3536</a>.</li>
<li>Allow posts with Idea Hub drafts to be trashed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3514" rel="nofollow ugc">#3514</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance user survey display with added animation on enter and exit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3509" rel="nofollow ugc">#3509</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a bug related to localized number formatting for browsers that have limited support for formatting options. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3255" rel="nofollow ugc">#3255</a>.</li>
<li>Improve table views on mobile screens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3138" rel="nofollow ugc">#3138</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where AMP mode detection would not consider the AMP plugin&#8217;s template mode setting when the Web Stories plugin is active. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2998" rel="nofollow ugc">#2998</a>.</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.31.0</h4>

<ul>

<li>Implement the technical infrastructure for rendering GA4 snippets in the frontend, including support for double tagging integrating with a UA snippet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3106" rel="nofollow ugc">#3106</a>.</li>
<li>Implement REST data point and JS data store selector to look up a single GA4 property by ID. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3102" rel="nofollow ugc">#3102</a>.</li>
<li>Rename &#8220;Popularity&#8221; / &#8220;Top Queries&#8221; section to &#8220;Acquisition&#8221; for new widget-based UI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3065" rel="nofollow ugc">#3065</a>.</li>
<li>Improve styling for Site Kit header, especially on mobile devices. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3058" rel="nofollow ugc">#3058</a>.</li>
<li>Update remaining external links in widgets on module pages to include correct date range parameters. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3042" rel="nofollow ugc">#3042</a>.</li>
<li>Improve speed and reliability of Analytics property matching. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3012" rel="nofollow ugc">#3012</a>.</li>
<li>Add placeholder to all &#8220;Other&#8221; text input fields in user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2993" rel="nofollow ugc">#2993</a>.</li>
<li>Implement data store selector to detect whether a GA4 property has a web data stream that matches the current site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2981" rel="nofollow ugc">#2981</a>.</li>
<li>Update the <code>modules/analytics-4</code> store with actions and selectors for creating and querying web data streams. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2980" rel="nofollow ugc">#2980</a>.</li>
<li>Implement JS data store infrastructure to query and create GA4 properties. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2979" rel="nofollow ugc">#2979</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce new JS asset for upcoming GA4 integration. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2977" rel="nofollow ugc">#2977</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce JS data store <code>modules/analytics-4</code> as infrastructure for upcoming GA4 integration. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2976" rel="nofollow ugc">#2976</a>.</li>
<li>Allow modifying the active Search Console property in the module&#8217;s settings panel, relevant for example when a site has multiple applicable properties. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2937" rel="nofollow ugc">#2937</a>.</li>
<li>Fix accessibility problem where it wasn&#8217;t possible to delete user input search terms using the keyboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2900" rel="nofollow ugc">#2900</a>.</li>
<li>Update user input styles to fix visual issues on small devices. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2886" rel="nofollow ugc">#2886</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate AdSense module page &#8220;Top earning pages&#8221; widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2066" rel="nofollow ugc">#2066</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update Unique Visitors widget to display the actual number of users coming from search. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3064" rel="nofollow ugc">#3064</a>.</li>
<li>Fix visual spacing problems with widget-based dashboard due to empty containers disrupting grid layout. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3062" rel="nofollow ugc">#3062</a>.</li>
<li>Update Site Kit widgets to always return their content wrapped in a <code>Widget</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3060" rel="nofollow ugc">#3060</a>.</li>
<li>Update AdSense dashboard widgets to render ad blocker warning. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3011" rel="nofollow ugc">#3011</a>.</li>
<li>Fix broken alignment of data block elements when there is one with zero data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2992" rel="nofollow ugc">#2992</a>.</li>
<li>Fix UI issues on the pie chart of the All Traffic widget when there is just a single slice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2991" rel="nofollow ugc">#2991</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Analytics links in new widgets on the Analytics module page to take into account selected days. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2983" rel="nofollow ugc">#2983</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a bug where select menu components could be partially covered by the Site Kit header making some items unclickable. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2885" rel="nofollow ugc">#2885</a>.</li>
<li>Improve performance of potentially slow database query to migrate user data from an older version of Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2870" rel="nofollow ugc">#2870</a>.</li>
<li>Fix issue with AdSense existing site detection when using camelcase URLs in WordPress settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2695" rel="nofollow ugc">#2695</a>.</li>
<li>Fix javascript issues that appear when admin pages have been translated with Google Translate. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2280" rel="nofollow ugc">#2280</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.30.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add tracking events for help visibility menu links. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3027" rel="nofollow ugc">#3027</a>.</li>
<li>Scaffold <code>analytics-4</code> module PHP class. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2974" rel="nofollow ugc">#2974</a>.</li>
<li>Clarify wording of warning message when disabling the AdSense snippet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2962" rel="nofollow ugc">#2962</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce hidden labels for search term fields of the User Input Settings flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2901" rel="nofollow ugc">#2901</a>.</li>
<li>Fix low-contrast color for keyword bubbles in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2896" rel="nofollow ugc">#2896</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that the user is not sent to the user input flow when granting additional scopes after being already authenticated, even if submitting the user input response is still required. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2874" rel="nofollow ugc">#2874</a>.</li>
<li>Update assets across the plugin with new side kick-based branding illustrations. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2616" rel="nofollow ugc">#2616</a>.</li>
<li>Include button to reset Site Kit under &#8220;Available Tools&#8221; in WordPress, as a way to reset the plugin data e.g. when currently not being connected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2384" rel="nofollow ugc">#2384</a>.</li>
<li>Update modules settings to use separate components for active and inactive modules. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2184" rel="nofollow ugc">#2184</a>.</li>
<li>Improve the pre-setup compatibility checks to properly warn if the REST API is disabled instead of failing with an unexpected error. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2101" rel="nofollow ugc">#2101</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Analytics module page Top Acquisition Channels widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2069" rel="nofollow ugc">#2069</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Analytics module page popular pages widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2068" rel="nofollow ugc">#2068</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Analytics module page overview widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2067" rel="nofollow ugc">#2067</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate AdSense module page overview widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2065" rel="nofollow ugc">#2065</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Search Console module page popular keywords widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2064" rel="nofollow ugc">#2064</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Search Console module page overview widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2063" rel="nofollow ugc">#2063</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix critical JS error due to a new version of the Google charts library being released, by locking to a specific version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3132" rel="nofollow ugc">#3132</a>.</li>
<li>Fix regression where modules may be sorted incorrectly on the plugin&#8217;s settings screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3093" rel="nofollow ugc">#3093</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug with help visibility icon in header where clicking it wouldn&#8217;t trigger the menu to open in some scenarios, and also address some visual design problems with it. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3026" rel="nofollow ugc">#3026</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Ad Blocker detection issue which occurred on sites with GoDaddy CDN enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3018" rel="nofollow ugc">#3018</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure changing the site URL between HTTP and HTTPS or <code>www.</code> and non-<code>www.</code> does not impact the results displayed in Analytics and AdSense widgets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3005" rel="nofollow ugc">#3005</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where Analytics snippet could still be placed when an existing snippet was already present in the frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2909" rel="nofollow ugc">#2909</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that the AdSense snippet is not included on 404 pages in the frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2784" rel="nofollow ugc">#2784</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.29.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Only show notice about a user input question affecting other users of the site if there is more than one authorized user on the site overall. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2852" rel="nofollow ugc">#2852</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce new contextual help menu in Site Kit header bar and on the authentication service. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2846" rel="nofollow ugc">#2846</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce tooltip tour guiding the user through the new version of the All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2739" rel="nofollow ugc">#2739</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance <code>PreviewBlock</code> JS component to support breakpoint-specific sizes via props. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2727" rel="nofollow ugc">#2727</a>.</li>
<li>Implement persistent dismissal of feature tours, stored in the database. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2650" rel="nofollow ugc">#2650</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>ReportTable</code> component for displaying reusable data tables. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2249" rel="nofollow ugc">#2249</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix vertical axis labels for Session Duration graph on Search Console module page to not mix minutes and hours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2967" rel="nofollow ugc">#2967</a>.</li>
<li>Fix problem where OAuth callback login would be triggered before WordPress&#8217;s login redirect mechanism, immediately failing instead of redirecting as expected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2935" rel="nofollow ugc">#2935</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure entering a text is required when choosing the &#8220;Other&#8221; option for a question in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2907" rel="nofollow ugc">#2907</a>.</li>
<li>Fix refactored Analytics goals widget behavior to match legacy version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2858" rel="nofollow ugc">#2858</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where switching between questions in the user input flow did not scroll the question into view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2848" rel="nofollow ugc">#2848</a>.</li>
<li>Cache user input responses temporarily in browser until it is submitted while the user is going through the flow, to prevent accidentally losing entered data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2844" rel="nofollow ugc">#2844</a>.</li>
<li>Clarify wording in last user input question about search terms. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2843" rel="nofollow ugc">#2843</a>.</li>
<li>Fix some bugs in the behavior when checking or unchecking an &#8220;Other&#8221; option for one of the questions in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2828" rel="nofollow ugc">#2828</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.28.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Implement React components for rendering tooltip tours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2626" rel="nofollow ugc">#2626</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Automatically focus the &#8220;Other&#8221; text input upon selecting the &#8220;Other&#8221; option in a list of radio buttons or checkboxes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2897" rel="nofollow ugc">#2897</a>.</li>
<li>Update copy to clarify multiple choice behavior in user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2857" rel="nofollow ugc">#2857</a>.</li>
<li>Update links on new version of AdSense dashboard summary widget to deep link to the respective area in the AdSense frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2774" rel="nofollow ugc">#2774</a>.</li>
<li>Include site URL in AdSense report deep links to point to the appropriate report. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2773" rel="nofollow ugc">#2773</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for PHP 8 and ensure its maintenance via CI. Props TorbenLundsgaard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2724" rel="nofollow ugc">#2724</a>.</li>
<li>The <code>googlesitekit_authorize_user</code> and <code>googlesitekit_reauthorize_user</code> actions are now also fired when not using the authentication service flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2693" rel="nofollow ugc">#2693</a>.</li>
<li>Implement infrastructure for rendering widgets in Site Kit module screens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2653" rel="nofollow ugc">#2653</a>.</li>
<li>Use reliable and React-friendly approach for detecting whether a widget is inactive and should not be rendered. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2612" rel="nofollow ugc">#2612</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance localization of duration formatting. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2588" rel="nofollow ugc">#2588</a>.</li>
<li>Filter all Analytics API requests to only include results for the current domain. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2554" rel="nofollow ugc">#2554</a>.</li>
<li>Rely exclusively on SVGs for graphics and remove other image support. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2468" rel="nofollow ugc">#2468</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Improve UX around entering search terms in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2842" rel="nofollow ugc">#2842</a>.</li>
<li>Fix various visual glitches in the user input flow summary view and trim free text content entered for any &#8220;Other&#8221; choice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2837" rel="nofollow ugc">#2837</a>.</li>
<li>Change to preview / next button behaviour in User Input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2829" rel="nofollow ugc">#2829</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AdSense bug where <code>Ad Client not found</code> error would be displayed in certain cases where an account is still pending. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2812" rel="nofollow ugc">#2812</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where AdGuard and uBlock ad blockers were no longer being recognized by Site Kit by implementing a more holistic solution for ad blocker detection relying on the <code>just-detect-adblock</code> library. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2794" rel="nofollow ugc">#2794</a>.</li>
<li>Update link on AdSense module page to point to Analytics which is more accurate due to the source of the data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2772" rel="nofollow ugc">#2772</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Search Console x-axis labels on 90 day charts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2747" rel="nofollow ugc">#2747</a>.</li>
<li>Fix text issue with All Traffic pie chart. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2660" rel="nofollow ugc">#2660</a>.</li>
<li>Fix problem where Analytics snippet placement would not be re-instated after disconnecting Tag Manager module when it was previously taking care of the Analytics tag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2579" rel="nofollow ugc">#2579</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where tracking opt-in was not working for multisite administrators when not being a member of the site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2103" rel="nofollow ugc">#2103</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.27.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add support for AdSense auto ads to Web Stories, allowing to choose an AdSense ad unit to use which will then result in an <code>amp-story-auto-ads</code> element being injected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2602" rel="nofollow ugc">#2602</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Improve wording for the confirmation notification after submitting user input settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2790" rel="nofollow ugc">#2790</a>.</li>
<li>Allow resetting persistent Site Kit options via WP-CLI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2748" rel="nofollow ugc">#2748</a>.</li>
<li>Display All Traffic widget dimension tabs as a dropdown on narrow viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2743" rel="nofollow ugc">#2743</a>.</li>
<li>Include current dates in AdSense deep links so that the service frontend shows the same time period as Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2689" rel="nofollow ugc">#2689</a>.</li>
<li>Update Google API client library and remove custom configuration to retry failed API requests as it is now covered in the library itself. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2688" rel="nofollow ugc">#2688</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>WidgetReportError</code> component, which should be used by widgets to display an overall error state. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2670" rel="nofollow ugc">#2670</a>.</li>
<li>Implement REST datapoints and JS datastore infrastructure for getting and dismissing tooltip tours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2648" rel="nofollow ugc">#2648</a>.</li>
<li>Prepare Widget API-based version of the dashboard for launch, rendering the entire page content including header and footer. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2646" rel="nofollow ugc">#2646</a>.</li>
<li>Add ability to remotely control enabled feature flags. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2533" rel="nofollow ugc">#2533</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>core/ui</code> datastore for centrally storing UI state in JS. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2456" rel="nofollow ugc">#2456</a>.</li>
<li>Include current dates in Analytics deep links so that the service frontend shows the same time period as Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2287" rel="nofollow ugc">#2287</a>.</li>
<li>Remove legacy version of the WP Dashboard widget and replace it with Site Kit widget-based refactored version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2240" rel="nofollow ugc">#2240</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug where the old All Traffic widget was still displaying in the dashboard for a single URL. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2856" rel="nofollow ugc">#2856</a>.</li>
<li>Fix PHP 8 notice for deprecated <code>uasort()</code> usage. Props oguilleux. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2797" rel="nofollow ugc">#2797</a>.</li>
<li>Reset link hidden while compatibility checks are in progress. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2756" rel="nofollow ugc">#2756</a>.</li>
<li>Show All Traffic pie chart tooltips persistently when a slice is selected to allow interaction with the tooltip, which would not be possible when hovering. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2737" rel="nofollow ugc">#2737</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AdSense dashboard summary widget to include data for the current date range in its sparklines rather than only data from the 1st of the current month. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2734" rel="nofollow ugc">#2734</a>.</li>
<li>Fix visual bug where in the AdSense flow the toggle element could be overlapped by a checkmark icon. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2722" rel="nofollow ugc">#2722</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug with Search Console module page graph where overlapping legends would be displayed when selecting more than 2 metrics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2721" rel="nofollow ugc">#2721</a>.</li>
<li>Fix various bugs around the All Traffic pie chart (e.g. incorrect slices being selected when changing date range, correct behavior of not allowing &#8220;Others&#8221; to be selected) by introducing a new React-based charts component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2714" rel="nofollow ugc">#2714</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where in some occasions an error would be displayed when updating settings with the same values that were already stored before. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2513" rel="nofollow ugc">#2513</a>.</li>
<li>Fix formatting of y-axis values for Bounce Rate and Session Duration on Analytics overview chart. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2095" rel="nofollow ugc">#2095</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.26.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure that any &#8220;Others&#8221; slice in the All Traffic widget is not indicated as selectable and cannot be active. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2716" rel="nofollow ugc">#2716</a>.</li>
<li>When viewing a specific segment of users in the All Traffic widget, make the &#8220;All Users&#8221; breadcrumb a link to go back to the overall users view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2715" rel="nofollow ugc">#2715</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance All Traffic widget pie chart legend by using a custom implementation so that the labels are never cut off and include a visual hover and active state. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2700" rel="nofollow ugc">#2700</a>.</li>
<li>Show more than just two dates on the All Traffic widget&#8217;s line chart. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2699" rel="nofollow ugc">#2699</a>.</li>
<li>Include available and enabled Site Kit features in Site Health information. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2662" rel="nofollow ugc">#2662</a>.</li>
<li>Rename the <code>header</code> and <code>footer</code> props of the <code>Widget</code> component to <code>Header</code> and <code>Footer</code> to indicate that they require a React component instead of an element. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2652" rel="nofollow ugc">#2652</a>.</li>
<li>Simplify usage of the <code>Widget</code> component so that widget components can use a scoped version of it via props rather than manually importing it and re-specifying the widget slug. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2613" rel="nofollow ugc">#2613</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate top content table in WP dashboard widget to functional hook-based component using the datastore. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2610" rel="nofollow ugc">#2610</a>.</li>
<li>Decouple JS store, widget, and module registration from imports, introducing dedicated registration functions. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2587" rel="nofollow ugc">#2587</a>.</li>
<li>Remove server-side API requests to determine whether a post has Search Console or Analytics data as it could significantly slow down WP admin response time. Props archon810. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2528" rel="nofollow ugc">#2528</a>.</li>
<li>Always display the Site Kit admin bar menu even when there is no data for a more consistent experience, informing about the lack of data as applicable. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2508" rel="nofollow ugc">#2508</a>.</li>
<li>Improve UX when clicking the Reset dialog button, keeping the dialog open in a loading state while completing the process. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2347" rel="nofollow ugc">#2347</a>.</li>
<li>Include current dates in Search Console deep links so that the service frontend shows the same time period as Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2286" rel="nofollow ugc">#2286</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance admin bar implementation to be powered by the <code>googlesitekit.data</code> registry and its stores. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2241" rel="nofollow ugc">#2241</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure x-axis labels of the All Traffic line chart are correctly aligned with the pie chart legend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2738" rel="nofollow ugc">#2738</a>.</li>
<li>Avoid layout shift when enabling the Analytics module via the Site Kit dashboard CTA. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2719" rel="nofollow ugc">#2719</a>.</li>
<li>Avoid content shifts in All Traffic widget due to incorrect loading UI layout. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2710" rel="nofollow ugc">#2710</a>.</li>
<li>Only require going through the user input flow after setup if it has not been completed by the user before. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2603" rel="nofollow ugc">#2603</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.25.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Launch new All Traffic widget in the Site Kit dashboard, which surfaces more detailed information about channels, includes a time-based graph, and surfaces similar metrics for countries and devices the site is accessed from. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2429" rel="nofollow ugc">#2429</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Modify pie chart tooltip behavior for new All Traffic widget so that tooltips are only shown when hovering over a pie slice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2701" rel="nofollow ugc">#2701</a>.</li>
<li>Store initial Site Kit version per user for more targeted messaging in the future and introduce <code>googlesitekit_reauthorize_user</code> action. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2692" rel="nofollow ugc">#2692</a>.</li>
<li>Improve user experience of new All Traffic widget for when it is loading and for when there is no relevant data available. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2675" rel="nofollow ugc">#2675</a>.</li>
<li>Fix layout of new All Traffic widget on mobile viewports to use a single column. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2663" rel="nofollow ugc">#2663</a>.</li>
<li>Add contextual documentation links to new All Traffic widget to explain special dimension values &#8220;(not set)&#8221; and &#8220;(other)&#8221;. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2642" rel="nofollow ugc">#2642</a>.</li>
<li>Modify new All Traffic widget so that the line chart always uses the same color indicated by the currently selected pie slice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2625" rel="nofollow ugc">#2625</a>.</li>
<li>Modify font styles in the new All Traffic widget to match font styles used in Search Funnel widget and elsewhere throughout the plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2623" rel="nofollow ugc">#2623</a>.</li>
<li>Rely on new Search Console &#8220;fresh data&#8221; feature to display metrics as recent as 1 day ago, improving on the previous offset of 2 days. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2522" rel="nofollow ugc">#2522</a>.</li>
<li>Remove various old REST datapoints in AdSense, Analytics, and Search Console modules that were only present to access specific settings and unused. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2507" rel="nofollow ugc">#2507</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>core/location</code> JS store, rely on it for redirects, and fix notification about unsatisfied scopes unnecessarily appearing before an OAuth redirect. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2497" rel="nofollow ugc">#2497</a>.</li>
<li>Get rid of remaining usage of legacy <code>dateRange</code> argument in AdSense widgets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2477" rel="nofollow ugc">#2477</a>.</li>
<li>Improve JS API caching layer to cache certain error responses if they include a <code>cacheTTL</code> extra data property, allowing to avoid excessive Analytics API requests when the AdSense account is not linked. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2457" rel="nofollow ugc">#2457</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce infrastructure for dynamically controlled feature flags via a <code>googlesitekit_is_feature_enabled</code> filter. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2452" rel="nofollow ugc">#2452</a>.</li>
<li>Implement logic to automatically combine UI for widgets that are in special states, e.g. widgets without sufficient API response data, or widgets that require a specific module to be set up first. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2252" rel="nofollow ugc">#2252</a>.</li>
<li>Add widget contexts and register widget areas for Site Kit module pages. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2062" rel="nofollow ugc">#2062</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix All Traffic widget UI bug where pie chart tooltips would flicker when hovering over them. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2709" rel="nofollow ugc">#2709</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure line chart in All Traffic is correctly aligned with the overall count and the pie chart at the bottom. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2708" rel="nofollow ugc">#2708</a>.</li>
<li>Fix performance lag across Site Kit screens due to a problem in the <code>getModules</code> selector of the <code>core/modules</code> store. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2691" rel="nofollow ugc">#2691</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where Tag Manager and Analytics snippet could be inserted twice on AMP pages. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2668" rel="nofollow ugc">#2668</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug with All Traffic widget where selected pie slice would no longer remain selected when changing the current date range. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2644" rel="nofollow ugc">#2644</a>.</li>
<li>Fix graph in All Traffic widget to not cut off axis labels on viewports smaller than desktop. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2624" rel="nofollow ugc">#2624</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.24.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Implement <code>UserDimensionsPieChart</code> component for new Analytics All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2425" rel="nofollow ugc">#2425</a>.</li>
<li>Implement main tabs UI for the new All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2424" rel="nofollow ugc">#2424</a>.</li>
<li>Implement <code>TotalUserCount</code> component for new Analytics All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2423" rel="nofollow ugc">#2423</a>.</li>
<li>Implement <code>UserCountGraph</code> component for new Analytics All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2422" rel="nofollow ugc">#2422</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add review and support links in the plugin&#8217;s list table entry. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2516" rel="nofollow ugc">#2516</a>.</li>
<li>Rename <code>icon</code> argument of <code>registerWidgetArea</code> to <code>Icon</code> and require it to be a <code>WPComponent</code> (e.g. an SVG). See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2505" rel="nofollow ugc">#2505</a>.</li>
<li>Improve UX for modifying user input settings, removing the requirement to click through subsequent questions when only wanting to change a specific response. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2499" rel="nofollow ugc">#2499</a>.</li>
<li>Implement dynamic source link in the new All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2428" rel="nofollow ugc">#2428</a>.</li>
<li>Add interactivity to new All Traffic widget so that selecting a pie chart slice contextually updates the count and graph displayed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2426" rel="nofollow ugc">#2426</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for a <code>dimensionFilters</code> argument to the Analytics <code>GET:report</code> REST datapoint in PHP and the <code>getReport</code> selector in JS. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2421" rel="nofollow ugc">#2421</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance <code>whenActive</code> higher-order component to accept a <code>FallbackComponent</code> as well as an <code>IncompleteComponent</code> prop. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2381" rel="nofollow ugc">#2381</a>.</li>
<li>Remove legacy publisher win notifications. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2285" rel="nofollow ugc">#2285</a>.</li>
<li>Add <code>storeName</code> argument to <code>registerModule</code> action of the <code>core/modules</code> store to specify the name of the JS datastore for the module. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2271" rel="nofollow ugc">#2271</a>.</li>
<li>Move date awareness for Search Console API requests to the client, allowing for more contextual date information to be available. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2237" rel="nofollow ugc">#2237</a>.</li>
<li>Move date awareness for Analytics API requests to the client, allowing for more contextual date information to be available. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2236" rel="nofollow ugc">#2236</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>getGoogleSupportURL</code> selector to <code>core/site</code> store in JS. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2221" rel="nofollow ugc">#2221</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for an optional <code>SettingsSetupIncompleteComponent</code> argument to the <code>registerModule</code> action of the <code>core/modules</code> store, allowing developers to register a custom UI component for when the module is not fully connected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2080" rel="nofollow ugc">#2080</a>.</li>
<li>Update the plugin&#8217;s admin bar menu to rely on functional hook-based components using the datastore. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2076" rel="nofollow ugc">#2076</a>.</li>
<li>Update the plugin&#8217;s WordPress dashboard widget to rely on functional hook-based components using the datastore. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2075" rel="nofollow ugc">#2075</a>.</li>
<li>Switch <code>core/user/data/user-input-settings</code> REST endpoint to use remote authentication service API endpoint. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2048" rel="nofollow ugc">#2048</a>.</li>
<li>Implement user input block to edit responses under <code>Site Kit &gt; Settings &gt; Admin Settings</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2041" rel="nofollow ugc">#2041</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce reusable infrastructure for rendering tags, relying on new <code>Tag_Interface</code> and <code>Guard_Interface</code> interfaces as well as <code>Tag</code> and <code>Module_Tag</code> classes, now being used across all modules. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/475" rel="nofollow ugc">#475</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix AdSense overview graph UI so that the available space for the total numbers expands as necessary. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2555" rel="nofollow ugc">#2555</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent a remote notifications API request for development sites where the plugin is not using the authentication service. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2495" rel="nofollow ugc">#2495</a>.</li>
<li>Fix JavaScript error triggered upon resetting the plugin&#8217;s data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2478" rel="nofollow ugc">#2478</a>.</li>
<li>Update all Analytics deep links to use the <code>getServiceReportURL</code> selector for correct encoding of parameters and consistent behavior. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2405" rel="nofollow ugc">#2405</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug in legacy API layer dealing with errors in a batch response that could result in infinite loading states on module pages. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2403" rel="nofollow ugc">#2403</a>.</li>
<li>Improve Analytics property matching logic so that users with many Analytics accounts do not run into user quota errors. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2218" rel="nofollow ugc">#2218</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>numFmt</code> function for centralized Site Kit-specific number formatting, localize percentage formatting, and fix various number formatting inconsistencies. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2200" rel="nofollow ugc">#2200</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.23.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Scaffold components for a new version of the Analytics All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2392" rel="nofollow ugc">#2392</a>.</li>
<li>Display graph with historic AdSense data on module page, showing earnings, RPM, impressions and CTR over time. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1921" rel="nofollow ugc">#1921</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce <code>listFormat</code> function to format entries in a comma-separated list. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2486" rel="nofollow ugc">#2486</a>.</li>
<li>Rename arguments across various datastore actions requiring a <code>WPComponent</code> type to use capitalized names to better indicate a <code>WPComponent</code> (and not a <code>WPElement</code>) is required. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2413" rel="nofollow ugc">#2413</a>.</li>
<li>Improve validation of user input submission states. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2323" rel="nofollow ugc">#2323</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>ActivateModuleCTA</code> and <code>CompleteModuleActivationCTA</code> components to centrally manage UI for those scenarios. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2299" rel="nofollow ugc">#2299</a>.</li>
<li>Remove legacy <code>googlesitekit.moduleHasSetupWizard</code> JS filter. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2291" rel="nofollow ugc">#2291</a>.</li>
<li>Remove legacy splash screen and the associated components. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2290" rel="nofollow ugc">#2290</a>.</li>
<li>Allow registering module icon SVGs via the <code>core/modules</code> action <code>registerModule</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2143" rel="nofollow ugc">#2143</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix various low-level technical bugs due to duplicate module initialization by relying on a single reused Webpack runtime across entrypoints. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2444" rel="nofollow ugc">#2444</a>.</li>
<li>Remove duplicate error message UI on top of module settings panel, since error messages are now displayed within the panel&#8217;s main content already. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2396" rel="nofollow ugc">#2396</a>.</li>
<li>Fix component-specific initialization logic of Google charts library to prevent duplicate initialization. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2247" rel="nofollow ugc">#2247</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.22.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Surface WordPress-specific user experience recommendations in the PageSpeed Insights widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2390" rel="nofollow ugc">#2390</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for <code>checkRequirements</code> argument to <code>registerModule</code> action of <code>core/modules</code> store, which allows to block a module from being activated until certain requirements are met. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2130" rel="nofollow ugc">#2130</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure that all URIs on the authentication service are automatically refreshed as necessary when connecting as a user to an already connected site, fixing issues where sites could get stuck after updating their URLs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2383" rel="nofollow ugc">#2383</a>.</li>
<li>Move the date picker into the Site Kit header bar and make it sticky so that it is always visible when scrolling. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2331" rel="nofollow ugc">#2331</a>.</li>
<li>Remove outdated dashboard notification warning vaguely about missing permissions, which is now covered with more specific widget CTAs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2329" rel="nofollow ugc">#2329</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for feature flags in PHP and experimentally require user input completion upon setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2316" rel="nofollow ugc">#2316</a>.</li>
<li>Implement success notification displayed after completing the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2283" rel="nofollow ugc">#2283</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for displaying datastore-driven global error notifications in the plugin header. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2261" rel="nofollow ugc">#2261</a>.</li>
<li>Improve logic to determine whether a Search Console API report response is &#8220;empty&#8221;, via new <code>isZeroReport</code> function for Search Console. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2244" rel="nofollow ugc">#2244</a>.</li>
<li>Improve logic to determine whether an Analytics API report response is &#8220;empty&#8221;, via new <code>isZeroReport</code> function for Analytics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2243" rel="nofollow ugc">#2243</a>.</li>
<li>Rely on JavaScript date parsing for AdSense widgets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2235" rel="nofollow ugc">#2235</a>.</li>
<li>Add <code>core/modules</code> actions and selectors for managing module settings panel state. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2181" rel="nofollow ugc">#2181</a>.</li>
<li>Implement Site Kit dashboard notification for when requesting user input to be completed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2043" rel="nofollow ugc">#2043</a>.</li>
<li>Implement exponential backoff to retry Google service API requests a limited amount of time if they fail with temporary errors. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1998" rel="nofollow ugc">#1998</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix Search Console latest data threshold back to 2 days ago as that is the latest data the API provides. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2458" rel="nofollow ugc">#2458</a>.</li>
<li>Make e2e tests pass for WordPress 5.6. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2455" rel="nofollow ugc">#2455</a>.</li>
<li>Fix race condition where widgets could run into an error when their necessary datastore selector had not started resolving yet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2436" rel="nofollow ugc">#2436</a>.</li>
<li>Fix various spelling errors throughout the UI of the plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2401" rel="nofollow ugc">#2401</a>.</li>
<li>Flush browser session storage on plugin updates to prevent stale data from being served against new logic. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2334" rel="nofollow ugc">#2334</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that REST API preloaded data is not computed and included outside of Site Kit admin screens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2315" rel="nofollow ugc">#2315</a>.</li>
<li>Fix failing PHPUnit tests for compatibility with upcoming WordPress 5.6. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2264" rel="nofollow ugc">#2264</a>.</li>
<li>Fix broken Analytics frontend deep links on AdSense module page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2228" rel="nofollow ugc">#2228</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.21.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Include current user&#8217;s Site Kit capabilities in Site Health report. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2314" rel="nofollow ugc">#2314</a>.</li>
<li>Mark user input state as completed once user has submitted their information. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2310" rel="nofollow ugc">#2310</a>.</li>
<li>Finalize copy for new <code>googlesitekit-user-input</code> screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2302" rel="nofollow ugc">#2302</a>.</li>
<li>Display informational warning before setup about limited support for WordPress versions before 5.0. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2289" rel="nofollow ugc">#2289</a>.</li>
<li>Modify Search Console API queries so that they include results up until one day ago. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2284" rel="nofollow ugc">#2284</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for widgets to have multiple (fallback) widths via <code>googlesitekit.widgets.registerWidget</code>, laying out widget grid with as few gaps as possible. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2251" rel="nofollow ugc">#2251</a>.</li>
<li>Modify widgets registered with <code>quarter</code> width to render for half the screen width on mobile viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2250" rel="nofollow ugc">#2250</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>ReportError</code> and <code>ReportZero</code> components which should be returned by widgets that are in error state or have no data to display. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2246" rel="nofollow ugc">#2246</a>.</li>
<li>Add JS utility functions <code>sumObjectListValue</code>, <code>averageObjectListValue</code>, and enhance capabilities of <code>extractForSparkline</code> function. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2245" rel="nofollow ugc">#2245</a>.</li>
<li>Improve logic to determine whether an AdSense API report response is &#8220;empty&#8221;, via new <code>isZeroReport</code> function for AdSense. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2242" rel="nofollow ugc">#2242</a>.</li>
<li>Simplify adding strings only visible to screen reader users by implementing a <code>VisuallyHidden</code> component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2165" rel="nofollow ugc">#2165</a>.</li>
<li>Reduce complexity of implementing and registering <code>settingsEdit</code> components for a module by centrally handling setting submission. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2137" rel="nofollow ugc">#2137</a>.</li>
<li>Modify the <code>createModuleStore</code> JavaScript function so that every module store has a <code>canSubmitChanges</code> selector and a <code>submitChanges</code> action. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2136" rel="nofollow ugc">#2136</a>.</li>
<li>Implement UI design for <code>googlesitekit-user-input</code> screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2040" rel="nofollow ugc">#2040</a>.</li>
<li>Simplify module class infrastructure and implement (internal) module registry. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1939" rel="nofollow ugc">#1939</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug where Analytics widgets would fire their API requests even when the module wasn&#8217;t completely set up, resulting in unnecessary error responses. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2358" rel="nofollow ugc">#2358</a>.</li>
<li>Fix JavaScript translations that were not appearing to work correctly, given the site uses WordPress &gt;= 5.0, which is required for support of JavaScript translations. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2171" rel="nofollow ugc">#2171</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where a previous error from an action would not be cleared when trying the same action again. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2156" rel="nofollow ugc">#2156</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a few translation strings that were concatenating date ranges, making them correctly translatable. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2146" rel="nofollow ugc">#2146</a>.</li>
<li>Fix compatibility issue where <code>amp-auto-ads</code> element would not be present in AMP singular content when also using the Yoast SEO plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2111" rel="nofollow ugc">#2111</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.20.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Implement post search widget using the new Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2023" rel="nofollow ugc">#2023</a>.</li>
<li>Allow registering a <code>settingsViewComponent</code> and <code>settingsEditComponent</code> when calling the <code>registerModule</code> action on the <code>core/modules</code> store. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1623" rel="nofollow ugc">#1623</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Unregister the site from the authentication service when the plugin is deleted. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2311" rel="nofollow ugc">#2311</a>.</li>
<li>Add selectors <code>canSubmitChanges</code> and <code>isDoingSubmitChanges</code> and action <code>submitChanges</code> to <code>core/modules</code> datastore. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2182" rel="nofollow ugc">#2182</a>.</li>
<li>Add selectors <code>getModuleDependencyNames</code> and <code>getModuleDependantNames</code> to <code>core/modules</code> store. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2180" rel="nofollow ugc">#2180</a>.</li>
<li>Allow registering a <code>setupComponent</code> when calling the <code>registerModule</code> action on the <code>core/modules</code> store. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2074" rel="nofollow ugc">#2074</a>.</li>
<li>Implement UI for new splash screen based on authentication service improvements. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2046" rel="nofollow ugc">#2046</a>.</li>
<li>Detect and store whether each user has already answered the user input questions to customize the plugin behavior. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2042" rel="nofollow ugc">#2042</a>.</li>
<li>Implement UI components to use in <code>googlesitekit-user-input</code> screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2039" rel="nofollow ugc">#2039</a>.</li>
<li>Add Analytics tracking events for API request errors. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1999" rel="nofollow ugc">#1999</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug where errors would be inconsistently keyed and not cleared as expected in certain cases. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2210" rel="nofollow ugc">#2210</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Search Console deep links to point to correct locations in case of a domain property as well. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2110" rel="nofollow ugc">#2110</a>.</li>
<li>Fix accessibility issue with links opening in a new tab by annotating them with screen reader text informing about it. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2093" rel="nofollow ugc">#2093</a>.</li>
<li>Fix several UI loading state issues across module setup flows. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1995" rel="nofollow ugc">#1995</a>.</li>
<li>Display text field to specify name when creating a new Tag Manager container, and prevent duplicate names which could have resulted in an error before. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1817" rel="nofollow ugc">#1817</a>.</li>
<li>Remove usage of JavaScript chunk files to fix potential issues with certain server configurations. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1391" rel="nofollow ugc">#1391</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.19.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce <code>getUserInputSettings</code> selector and <code>setUserInputSettings</code> and <code>saveUserInputSettings</code> actions on <code>core/user</code> store. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2037" rel="nofollow ugc">#2037</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>core/user/data/user-input-settings</code> REST datapoint. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2036" rel="nofollow ugc">#2036</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Display notice about new Analytics and link to relevant support resource. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2219" rel="nofollow ugc">#2219</a>.</li>
<li>Make <code>canSubmitChanges</code> selectors throughout different module datastores more testable and consistent. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2108" rel="nofollow ugc">#2108</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance new widget API so that only widget areas that have active widgets are rendered. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2021" rel="nofollow ugc">#2021</a>.</li>
<li>Provide accurate deep links for all Search Console and Analytics widgets, pointing to the corresponding location in the Google service frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1923" rel="nofollow ugc">#1923</a>.</li>
<li>Use direct SVG imports instead of an SVG sprite which can cause accessibility and testing issues. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1878" rel="nofollow ugc">#1878</a>.</li>
<li>Make AdSense module page UI more consistent with other modules, allowing to filter information by date instead of showing at-a-glance information for different date periods. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/317" rel="nofollow ugc">#317</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug where some data stores would be registered multiple times in JS. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2145" rel="nofollow ugc">#2145</a>.</li>
<li>Fix issue where admin bar would not show for URLs with unicode paths. Props kabirbd89. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1968" rel="nofollow ugc">#1968</a>.</li>
<li>Improve error handling during module setup and editing module settings so that any API errors are displayed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1859" rel="nofollow ugc">#1859</a>.</li>
<li>Fix menu positioning bug that would move menu item for WP Engine and Bluehost hosting providers. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1541" rel="nofollow ugc">#1541</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.18.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce several filters to allow blocking rendering or execution of Google service scripts in the frontend, allowing integration with e.g. 3P cookie consent plugins. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2087" rel="nofollow ugc">#2087</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce API layer for advanced Analytics event tracking configurations from other plugins. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1728" rel="nofollow ugc">#1728</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce <code>googlesitekit_canonical_home_url</code> filter, allowing (e.g. multilingual) plugins that contextually alter the home URL to fix potential issues with Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2131" rel="nofollow ugc">#2131</a>.</li>
<li>Remove unused properties in module PHP classes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2050" rel="nofollow ugc">#2050</a>.</li>
<li>Scaffold new <code>googlesitekit-user-input</code> screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2038" rel="nofollow ugc">#2038</a>.</li>
<li>Expand <code>Widget</code> component to correctly align vertically and support optional header and footer component props. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2022" rel="nofollow ugc">#2022</a>.</li>
<li>Improve authentication service permissions link to check Site Kit permissions first while not exposing the actual URL on the client. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1985" rel="nofollow ugc">#1985</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>User_Transients</code> PHP class for storing user-specific transients. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1964" rel="nofollow ugc">#1964</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>getDateRangeDates()</code> selector to <code>core/user</code> datastore to retrieve actual date strings based on the current date range. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1925" rel="nofollow ugc">#1925</a>.</li>
<li>Display error notification when refreshing an access token failed due to missing Site Kit authentication service requirements. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1848" rel="nofollow ugc">#1848</a>.</li>
<li>Update the Reset Site Kit dialog message to be more clear. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1825" rel="nofollow ugc">#1825</a>.</li>
<li>Provide guidance in Analytics setup flow when Tag Manager is already active and its container is configured to use Analytics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1382" rel="nofollow ugc">#1382</a>.</li>
<li>Provide guidance in Tag Manager setup flow when container is configured to use Analytics, including checks to ensure an eventual AMP container behaves correctly as well. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1381" rel="nofollow ugc">#1381</a>.</li>
<li>Remove Analytics module as requirement for Tag Manager module, decoupling them to be individual. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1380" rel="nofollow ugc">#1380</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix new AdSense Top Earning Pages widget displaying error instead of CTA to link AdSense and Analytics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2098" rel="nofollow ugc">#2098</a>.</li>
<li>Fix inconsistent loading state in Search Console Popular Keywords widget, which previously caused content shifting. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2013" rel="nofollow ugc">#2013</a>.</li>
<li>Show an error message if the URL for the single URL detail view cannot be identified as part of the site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2001" rel="nofollow ugc">#2001</a>.</li>
<li>Improve support for URLs containing unicode, mixed case, and bidirectional control characters when requesting and sending data to Search Console. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1567" rel="nofollow ugc">#1567</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.17.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Simplify module registration in JavaScript and only allow one registration call per module. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2024" rel="nofollow ugc">#2024</a>.</li>
<li>Improve accuracy of AdSense account status detection based on specific errors. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1919" rel="nofollow ugc">#1919</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate AdSense Top Earning Pages widget to new Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1902" rel="nofollow ugc">#1902</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate AdSense Summary widget to new Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1901" rel="nofollow ugc">#1901</a>.</li>
